Chin Association of Maryland chuan thuchhuah siamin June 27 hian Open Society Foundation chuan US Washington DC-ah thut khawm an nei dawn a, he hunah hian Mizoram-a Chin refugee te chungchang, raltlan te tanpui dan tur leh Mizoram tualchhung miten an lo mikhual dan tur te an sawiho dawn a.
Chin Association of Maryland hian Mizorama an zin report hi US State Department-ah an theh lut a. March 10-23, 2023 khan CAM Board Chairman Reverend Tim Siemens, Advisor Matthew Wilch leh Executive Director Zo
... 
 te dinhmun an rawn zir chiang a. Heng raltlante hian chhawmdawlna an mamawhzia an report-ah an tar lang a.
Matthew Wilch chuan, “Kan thil hmuh chhuah chu Mizoram State sorkar, NGO leh Kohhranten Myanmar atanga Chin refugee te hi tha takin an lo dawngsawng a ni,” a ti a, CAM Advisor chuan a report-ah hian, “Refugee te hi tualchhung mi te hian lo dawngsang tha hle mah se, khawvel hmun dang atangin tanpuina an mamawh tak zet a ni,” tiin a tar lang bawk a ni.
“Refugees te hian ven himna leh tanpuin
...
 hma an lak a ngai a ni, ” tiin CAM Executive Director Zo Tum Hmung chuan a sawi a. “A lehlamah chuan, Myanmar tualchhung Chin State atanga a thenawm Sagaing leh Magway region-a awmhmun an sawnsak te leh India-Myanmar ramri-a awm te pawh hian ven himna leh tanpuina an mamawh hle a ni,” a ti bawk.
Tuna an report pek hi February 1, 2021-a Myanmar sipai rorelna hnuaia an awm hnua a vawi lina a ni a. CAM chuan Open Society Foundation-ten he sawihona an thleng tur chu lawmawm an tih thu an sawi bawk.

KVIB leh DIC hnuaia PMEGP Loan dilte chu nimin khan I&PR Conf. Hall,CHANEM-ah kohkhawm anni a, personal Interview neihpui an ni.
Personal Interview neih hma hian Alexander V Chawngthu, DC kaihhruain District Level Task Force committee chu l&PR conference Hall ah an thukhawm a. He hunah hian PMEGP kum 2019-2020 loan diltute kawm dan tur leh loan pek an nih dan turte sawiho a nih bakah Loan pek
tur an thlanchhuah dan tur kawng te sawiho a ni. Kum danga an lo tih tawh thin angin Agency pahnih KVIB leh DIC hnuai atangin PMEGP Loan an pechhuak leh dawn a, nimin khan Loan diltute chu kohkhawm niin personal interview neihpui an ni. He hunah hian Champhai chhunga Bank hrang hrang aiawh te chuan interview hi an neihpui a, KVI hnuaiah mi 170 leh DIC hnuaia mi 35 te'n loan hi an dil a ni. Bank lam hian interview an neih atangin loan. pek tlaka an ngaih an thlang chhuak ang a, remchang hmasa berah Loan hi pekchhuah an ni dawn a ni. Loan hi sawrkar chuan za a 30 a tum dawn a ni.

Coronavirus in min chiah hneh mek laiin Virus vang ni lovin chhan dang vangin Nurse chungah thil duhawm lo tak a thleng leh ta.
Kum 31 a upa fa pawh 3 nei tawh NHS Nurse, Victoria Woodhall chu Middlecliffe, South Yorks a a chenna in pawn ah vawi tam vih niin a nunna a chan phah.
He thil thlen lai hi Covid 19 lockdown kalpui a nih lai mek a ni a, na tuara a ṭe thawm hi a ṭhenawm a awm chuan a lo hria. A pasal former soldier, Craig Woodhall chu pawikhawihtu nia tarlan a ni.
Thil thlen hnu hian a fate a tlanchhiatpui a, a hnu ah hian man a ni ta tho. Naupang te hian hliam na engmah an tuar lo bawk.
Craig Woodhall hi Victoria Woodhall nen hian thla 7 liam ta mai kum kal ta September thla a innei chauh an ni. Police, paramedics leh Yorkshire Air Ambulance te chu thil thlenna hmun lam pan mahse Victoria nunna erawh chhan theih a ni tawh lo a a boral thu an puang.
Craig hi Custody ah hren a ni. An ṭhenawm te sawidan in Craig leh Victoria te hian an inkarah buaina an nei fo a, an awm hran phah hial thu an sawi. Victoria hi Rotherham General Hospital a Nurse hnathawk lai a ni.

KVI Exhibition hi Pu F.J. Liantluanga, SDO (C) in a hawng a. Inkhawm buatsaihah hawnna thu sawiin eng eizawnna pawh zawh dawn ila, taima taka kan beih a tul vek a ni, a ti a. Tunlaia kan hriat tul tak ramkang tur ven leh thing leh mau humhalh a tulzia kalkhawmte a hrilh bawk a ni.
Exhibition hawnna inkhawm hi Pu K. Zoremsanga, DVIO, Mizoram KVI Board chuan a kaihruai a. Thuhma sawiin, India ramah hna hmu lo mi tam tak an awm a. Chung mite intun nunna tura an eizawnna siam sak hi KVI Board chuan a tum a ni a. Pu Gandhi an la kaia tualtah tilar tura hma a lo lakna dungzuiin KVI chuan emblem atan Hmui a hmang a. Tichuan KVI Scheme REGP leh PMEGP te hmangin a tuimite indin chhoh nan Bank in loan a pek atanga za zela 30 chu KVI hian a tum sak thin a ni, a ti. Amaherawh chu Mizote zingah loan lak huai tak, a rulh lam ngaihsak lo kan tam ta hi chu in ngaihtuah chian a tul hle a ni, Pu Zorema chuan a ti.
Exhibition hawn zawn veleh hian stall a thil zawrhte chu hralh chhuah nghal a ni a. Mipuiin an hlut hle a ni.

Lai Baptist Church, Yangon nih COVID-19 dohnak he pehtlai in an riantuannak an thanh LBC COVID-19 Prevention Committee (CPC) Riantuannak Tlawmpal. CPC komiti cu July 15, 2021 in dirh le riantuan thawk a si. Kan thawkka ahcun cylinder dur 2 tein kan thawk nain zumtu u le nau tanpinak in atu cu mizaw oxygen a herh mi (LBC + Non-LBC) sin ah oxygen liters 5000-6000 kar kan pek cang hna. July thla tantim in nihin tiang (zarh 2 fai) ah tangka sing 300 hrawng kan hman cang.
Pastor Za Uk Sang thithruain
... 
2021 in mizaw le midamka caah sup kan chuanpiak hna i kan chanh hna. Nizaan cu Butiria buti dawr, (Lily Bawi) nih a chuan he a phawtzamh he a kan tlawmh, inn 17 ca mizaw 30 kan chanh hna. Nihin August 5 hi Pi Mah Cin le chungkhar nih an kan tlawmh i inn 20 ca minung 35 sin kan phan kho.
CPC bawmchantu le tanpitu vialte Pathian nih thluachuah in pe hna sehlaw nan pekchanh mi zong kan hawile a damlo mi caah damnak bawmtu si ko seh. Cred-THT
Mizoram ralzam kong..Mizoram ah Myanmar ralzaam dornak hm
...
imh hi a si.
Hi Zawlei khua relief camp saknak caah Khuagthing khua upa pawl nih a herh mi rua le mau damhnak lei ah pumpek in an tuan i,
motor khat phur tluk an hlam khawh, tiah LPS news nih a langhter. Atulio ah Zawlsei camp ah hin ralzaam minung 100 tluk an i dor i, minung 40 hrawng tlum ding hmun sakchap ding in an i tim tiah kan theih. Hi Zawlsei relief camp hi 2021 kum ah MAH le a ralkap nih Myanmar ram ah uknak a lak hnu in Chin miphun ralzaam tampi an umnak a si, tiah kan theih. Cred-THT

Eklavya Model Residential School (EMRS), Ngopa, Lawngtlai, Chawngte leh Tuipang hnuaia post chi hrang hrang leh EMRS Lunglei leh Serchhip atana Nurse leh IV Grade (Watchmen) diltute tana hriattur pawimawh :-
1. Hna dil theih hun chhung : 04 March, 2020 thleng (Dar 4:00PM thleng)
2. Office hun chhungin Directorate of Social Welfare & Tribal Affairs Office, Chaltlang ah Rs. 20/- kengin lakchhuah theih a ni.
3. Online-a download/print ten Reception Counter-ah Seal chhuttir a, Rs. 20/- nena submit tur a ni a. Application Form a Department Seal a awmlo a nih chuan Reject an nih pawhin engmah an sawi buai thei lovang.

Kolasib District Bawrhsap Dr. H. Lalthlangliana chuan Vairengte-a silai hmehpuah chu Assam Police-ten tihloh theih loh dinhmun a an nawrna vang a nih thu leh he thil thleng avanga nunna chan leh hliam an awm chu pawi a tih thu a sawi.
Tun thla ni 26-a Vairengte IR Post-a Assam Police leh Mizoram Police-te innawrna chungchang leh ramri-a invenhimna kalpui chhunzawm dan chungchanga nimin
... 
gka ah te inngaihtlawmna leh lainatna tilan a pawimawh thu a sawi bawk.Kolasib District Bawrhsap chuan ramri-a buaina thleng a nih avangin tun hun hi inpuah-chahna tha zawka kalpui hunlai tak a nih thu sawiin, nimin zing khan ramri hrul a Mizoram Police duty-te tlawhchhuakin endikna leh inthlahdah lo tura infuihtharna a neihpui thu a sawi a. “Tawlhlet kan tum lova, kan Police-te huaisen zia hi rampum hriat ah pholan mek niin hmingthatna pawh kan chang mek a ni,” a ti a, “Hmingchhe thiang kan ni 
...
iin, heng te avang hian ruahmanna a hlawhchham phah theih thu a sawi bawk a. Inkahna thleng avanga Assam ramri hrula khua awmten lirthei dangin Rel kawng thlenga dan tum a hma an la ni a hriat a nih thu sawiin, heng buaina te hi chinfel tum mek a nih rualin nitin mamawh lakkhawm kawngah midangte ngaihtuah tel chunga khawsak thiam a tul thu a sawi a. Ramri venhim hna tha zawk a kalpui a nih theih nan mipuite chu tlawh tam rih lo turin Bawrhsap chuan a ngen nghal bawk a ni.

Naypyidaw ih kaihtuar Aung San Suu Kyi bodyguard Cherry Htet cu December 30 ah Yangon-Mandalay lakih Yamethin thawnginn ah an ṭhawn tiah theih a si.
Palikbawi (ဒုရဲအုပ်) Cherry Htet cu September 21 ah palikbawi (ရဲအုပ်) Pyae Phyo Naing thawn Naypyidaw ah kaihkhih an si ih, Pyae Phyo Naing sawntu cu khawi hmun ah an ret ti theih a si lo.
Cherry Htet cu palik phungdan vekin kum 3 thawngthlak a si zo thu theih a si ih, SAC ralhraang thubuai orhtermi pukmah (505) thubuai cu atu ah hmalaknak an nei rerolai ti a si.
Cherry Htet kaihkhih a si nak san cu NUG thawn pehtlaihawknak an nei ruangah a si tiah ralhraangbawi Zaw Min Htun in September 26 ah a relsuak a si.
@via Myanmar Sentiment

Children Film Festival 2018 chu ni 8 - 10 August 2018 chhung khian Lal Thanhawla Auditorium, Aizawl-ah neih a ni dawn a. Festival chhung hian India rama film tha leh awmze nei tak tak bakah Mizo Short Film pahnih ‘Rinna’ leh ‘Pialralah’, tunhnaia I&PR Department in short film competition a buatsaiha lawmman pakhatna leh pahnihna dawngte tihchhuah a ni dawn a ni.
Children Film Festival hi Ministry of Information & Broadcasting hnuaia Children Film Society India (CFSI) leh Dy.Commissioner, Aizawl te buatsaih tur a ni a. Hemi chungchang ngaihtuah hian Pu John LT Sanga, Dy. Commissioner, Aizawl hovin D.C Office Chamber-ah a kaihhnawih department te, I&PR, DEO, RMSA, SSA leh Mizoram Film Forum ten vawiin khan meeting an nei a. Festival hi ni 8.8.2018 ah I&PR Minister Pu Lal Thanzaran a hawng dawn a ni.
Zirlai pawl V atanga pawl XII, Government leh Private School thlan te Festival-ah hian sawm an ni a, CFSI atangin Joint Secretary chuan he hun hi a rawn hmanpui dawn bawk a ni.

Japanese star Kei Nishikori chuan Brisbane International title a la a, kum thum deuhthaw trophy a lak loh hnua a hlawhtlin lehna hmasa ber a ni.
World number nine Nishikori hian chawlhniah final khelin 6-4 3-6 6-2 in Russian Daniil Medvedev a hneh a, February 2016 hnua ATP Tour title a vuak chhuah hmasak ber niin a hlim hle tih a sawi.
Kum 29 mi Nishikori hian a banrekah hliam a neih avangin 2017 leh 2018-ah season hmang tluan lovin awl lai a nei ve ve a, kum hnih chhung hian trophy lak a nei lo a ni.
Qatar Open-ah Roberto Bautista Agut a champion ve thung a, inrinni khan final-ah 6-4 3-6 6-3 in Tomas Berdych a hneh.
World number 24 Bautista Agut hian semifinal-ah Novak Djokovic a hneh a, final-a a tumpui Berdych nen an insut hnuhnun vawi thumah tlawm vek mah se darkar khat leh minute 55 an inbeih hnuah a chak a ni.
Hopman Cup-ah a vawi li nan Switzerland an champion bawk a, Roger Federer leh Belinda Bencic chuan mixed doubles-ah Germany aiawha khel Angelic Kerber leh Alexander Zverev an hneh a ni.
Ram hrang hrang mipa leh hmeichhia tang kawpa tennis-a an inelna Hopman Cup-ah Switzerland an champion vawi lina a ni.
Mipa singles-ah Federer-an 6-4 6-2 in Zverev a hneh a, hmeichhe singles-ah Kerber chuan 6-4 8-6 in Swiss player Bencic hneh ve leh mah se mixed doubles-ah 4-0, 1-4, 4-3 in Swiss team an chak a, 2-1 in Germany an hneh a, kum zawnin an champion a ni.

May ni 20, 2010 khan police officer Bill Evans chuan lirthei pakhat, West Memphis a kawngpui, Arkansas bul lawkah ding turin thu a pe a. Evans-a hriat lohvin he lirthei a chuang mi pahnih, Jerry Kane Jr. leh a fapa rawlthar Joseph Kane te chu ‘sovereign citizens’ an tih, eng sorkarna mah pawmlo a do tlat mi an lo ni a. Kane-a hi chhiah pelo tura mipui fuih a zin kual reng, a remchan changa pastor anga insawi thin, miin an lo bih hlauh takin ti a a lirthei khalh chhunga Pathian Thu lam hawi tarma
... 
tary of Homeland Security, Janet Napolitano chuan report chu a pawmsak duhlo ta nge nge a, Johnson p[awh chu a hna atangin a ban phah ta a ni. Kum riat lek a liam a, Johnson-a report hrilhlawkna chu a lo thleng dik ta chat reng thung. Johnson-a’n sorkar hna a bansan kum, kum 2010 khan Austin-a sorkar building lian tak chuan beih a tawk a, kum 2012 khan Wisconsin-ah silai nen mingo firfiakte’n Sikh Temple an bei leh a, kum 2015 khan Charleston khua-ah mihang te inkhawmna hmun Biak In chu silai ne
...
at hnu ah, chuan ani hian hmanrua ah a hmang niin an inngai anga, amah hio an huat phah zawk ang tiin a sawi a.Hetianga firfiakna lo piang hian kalphung deuh a nei a. Chhiah chawi duhloh atanga intanin sorkar aia thunei zawk ni a inhriatna ah a lut a, silai lek pawl an lo chhuak zel a, a tawpah chuan Oklahoma City-a bomb tih puah ang kha a lo thleng ta thin niin McNab chuan a ngai a. Tunhnaia silai lek pawl an tam tak em avangin he kalphung hian a vawrtawp a thleng leh tep tawh niin a ngai bawk.

2482/2022-2023
Khawzawl, the 31st October, 2022: Deputy Commissioner's Office, Khawzawl District buatsaihin tukin khan Rashtriya Ekta Diwas (National Unity Day) pualin Unity Run neih a ni a. He hunah hian Addl. DC Pu Lalvenhima hovin Officer hrang hrangte, Govt. Khawzawl Higher Secondary School zirlai naupangte leh zirtirtute, an vaiin mi 100 vel an tel a; Taidawnkawn, Zaingen Veng atangin Pu Lalvenhima'n a vailiam a, Zuchhip Field No 1 thleng an tlan a ni.
e hun hmanpuitu Pu Lalvenhima, Addl. DC chuan Rashtriya Ekta Diwas chu Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel pianchamphaphak apianga hman thin a nih thu sawiin, he ni hian India ramin zalenna a hmuh theihna leh ram inpumkhatna a lo awm theihna atana a thawhrimnate leh beihnate min hriat thar tir leh thin a ni, a ti a. Thalaite chu hriselna ngai pawimawha infiamna leh taksa sawizawina lamte uar nasa turin a fuih bawk a ni.
He hunah hian Pu Kamdingliana, Lecturer, Govt. Khawzawl Higher Secondary School kaihhruaina hnuaiah National Unity Day pual thutiam lak a ni bawk.

Serchhip-ah Congress Party in ‘Operation E -Roll’ an nei
Serchhip Block Congress Committee President Lalramnghaka Kawlni kaihhruaia he hun hman hi Mizoram Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) atangin Secretary Rev. LR. Colney leh Organiser Thangliankhuma te chuan an rawn hmanpui a, he hunah hian Serchhip-a Unit hrang hrang leh Mahila bakah Upa Wing atangin mi pakhat theuh tel tura beisei niin mi 50 dawn an tel a, inthlanpui neih tur atana an hmalakna hrang hrangte ngaihthlak niin Campaign chhunzawm zel dan turte leh Electoral Roll-a Vote nei thei te an luh kim theihna tura hmalak dan turte pawh an sawiho bawk a ni.
Nimin-a he hun hman ah hian MPCC Secretary Rev. LR. Colney chuan India ramah BJP in Party mal-a sawrkarna State 10 leh an thawhpui te nen sawrkarna State 6 an nei tih sawiin, BJP Map-ah Mizoram chu BJP sawrkarna ang ah a lan thu a sawi a. Parliament thutkhawm neih zawh taka Manipur chungchang sawihona neih ah Mizoram Rajya Sabha MP K. Vanlalvena chuan thu sawi a duh tak tak a nih chuan Treasury Bench atangin a insawn chhuah a ngai nia sawiin, tun tuma a sawi dan chu Parliament kalphung atanga tehin sawi tur zinga ruat ni lo a, a thusawi kha pawm theih a ni lo niin a sawi bawk. Hei bakah hian Mizoram-a inthlanpui lo awm turah kan Sakhaw himna tura Missionary rilru pua vote thlak a ngai nia sawiin, MNF leh ZPM chu a ruka BJP zawm inchuh mai mai niin a sawi bawk.

SAC Ralkap hna cu Rihkhawdar No.1 sang ah a ummi an hawile nih hriamngan in an bawmh peng hna i hriamngan kuan pakhat cu khuachung ah a tlak caah Kalaymyo in a rami ralzaam pakhat a thi i khuami dang pathum zong hli
... 
 khangh le hrawhhralnak an tuah lengmang. Depeyin pengchung sining cu a zualhma ngaingai, inn khanghpiak a tongmi hna cu rawl eiding le fenh-aih hnipuan an har ngai, bawmchantu phu cheukhat le NUG nih tlawmpal bawmhnak a pek nain, an i za lo,” tiah tualchung mi nih an chim.
Depeyin peng tualchung hriamtlai Ngyi Naung phu nih khua 17 ah inn chungkhar 346 cu inn khat ah kyats 30,000 cio bawmhnak an pek hna nain, bawmh an herh tuk rih, tiah a chimchap. SAC ralkap lei chimphuannak nawlngeitu general
...
ih media ah a chim.
“Zinglei suimilam 9:00 hrawng ah Kani in Alaykyun pyusawhti umnak khua ah riahcaw a phortu Leeng 17 cu kan kah hna. Cu hnu zaanlei suimilam 4:30 hrawng ah Pekhin khua le Kedaung khua kar um SAC ralkap tilawng cu kan kah ṭhan. Cu ni zaanlei suimilam 6:00 ah Kin khua pawng ralvengtu SAC ralkap zong kan kah ṭhan hna. SAC ralkap hna cu nikhat chung ah voi 3 tiang kan kah hna i, cu kahdohnak ah cun SAC ralkap 16 an thi,” tiah Kyauk Lung Gyi KLG brigade in ṭuanvo ngeitu nih a chim.

Assam Rifles te hi kumin July thla khan Manipur atangin Aizawl-ah an rawn insawn a, Mizoram an rawn awm vawi khatna a ni. He hunah hian Chief Minister chuan ruihhlo leh ralthuam tawlhruk dona kawngah te, dan lova ramri kan-a mihring lut leh venhimna kawng dang dangah Assam Ri

kafai Rs.5000/- theuh a hlan a ni. Heng zirlai naupang te hi Distinction-a pass te vek niin Foxall HSS-a kal an ni a, Vawiin hian HSLC-a pass tha zirlaite chawimawina hun hman leh a ni ang.

Aizawl-a Cable TV pahnih, Zonet leh LPS tangdun in August 20, 2021 zan-a zaithiam leh mipui hriat hlawh te nen TV kaltlanga Charity Concert, Fairelbel an buatsaiha sum tlingkhawm Rs. 23,45,000/- chu nimin khan Aizawl District Bawrhsap Dr. Lalhriatzuali Ralte hnenah an hlan a, Dr. La
...
enna In-a neih ah hian Aizawl South-II bialtu MLA chuan ZPM chuan kut hnathawktu te hi ram hmasawnna hnuk pawimawh tak an ni tih hi an hrechiang tih a sawi a, “Chuvangin keini MLA te chuan kan phak ang tawk tawkin an dinhmun chawisan hi kan tum a ni a. Chumi tur chuan kan lo aupui fo thin ‘Bana kaih (Handholding policy)’ hi kan ngai pawimawh takzet a ni,” a ti a. Heng mistiri bungrua an inhlan te pawh hi tangkai tak leh hlawkpui taka hmang turin duhsakna a hlan bawk a ni.

Runmawi buatsaih Mizoram's Got Talent (MGT) 2021 chu November 26, Zirtawpni zan khan D&E Auditorium, Hualngohmunah tluang taka zawh fel a ni ta - pakhatna chu Lalrindika Zadeng, Chhinga Veng a ni. Rindika Zadeng hi mipui vote-ah pahnihna niin, judge te point pek nen belhkhawmin Champion a ni ta a ni - ₹3,00,000 a dawng.
MGT-ah hian audition, quarterfinal leh semifinal-ahte contestant za tel an inthlit fim hnuin, final round-ah contestant 14 an intihsiak leh a ni. Heng finalist te hi Golden Buzze
...

Tripura Assembly inthlanpui nimina neihah tluang taka vote thlak zawhfel a ni. Boruak muanawm tak hnuaiah vote thlak hi zawhfel a ni tih State Chief Electoral Officer, Sriram Taranikanti chuan a sawi. Tripura Assembly inthlanah hian polling station 3,174 siam a ni a, polling station 100 velah chuan nizan dar 10 pelh hnu thleng pawh khan vote thlak tum an la intlar tam hle a ni. Taranikanti chuan Assembly inthlan-ah hian vote a tla tha hle tih a sawi a, vote nei mi 2,536,589 zingah za zela 78-in vote an thlak a, VVPAT chhia 191 leh EVM chhia 89 a awm avangin, hmun thenkhatah chuan vote thlak a khaihlak a, Karamchara bial bikah inthlan that a ngaih tur thu a sawi bawk. CPIM hruaitu pakhat, Bijan Dhar chuan chanchinbumite a kawmna-ah hmun thenkhatah an party mi 5 chu BJP leh IPFT mi leh sa ten kut an thlak vangin, damdawiinah hruai an ni a ti.

iscount a um lai.

- Asylum seeker card or cahnah atlaih mi

i pawl nih birth certificate iken ding.
Card hi thla khat lo le thla 2 chungah aa chuak ding asi. Card cungah hotline number zong a um chih . Cun card hi ti na thlau ahcun thar lak than khawh asilo, renew caan a phak tik lawngah na ngah than lai. Card kan thlau sual asi ahcun police report tuah i report nak ca he MYRC office ah card atlaunak kong va chimh a herh mi a si.

"Fratelli tutti" timi capi thar cu St. Francis thlan ah Pope Francis in let hmat a tthu
October 3, 2020
Mithianghlim Francis Assisi a thi ni kumkim ni ah Pope Francis cu Fratelli tutti timi capi thar cu St. Francis thlan ih Assisi khuapi ah St. Francis a thih nak kum kim hminsin nak Missa raithawi nak theh ah let hmat a tthu a si.
Zarhte sun ah Pope Francis cu Assisi ih a feh thu le Tuu khal tuanvo thawn a tuan thok ihsin tui tum thawn cun Assisi khuapi cu a vei 5 nak a feh nak a si thu, a tlun ih capi cu Pope ih a vei 3 nak a suah mi capi a siih a vei 2 nak capi cu kan dung kum 5 lai ih a suah mi Laudato si leilungpi kilhimnak timi capi a si.
Assisi ah Pope cu mawtaw thawn a feh thu a tuahcun Vallengloria Siangbawi tlawng ah siseh, St. Clare ih Sister pawl asimi Poor Clare Sister tlawng ah siseh a feh ih cibai a buk. Pope ih hoha in a tuah mi Missa raithawi nakah Siangbawi 20 le Sister kaing thenkhat khal an tel thu, missa raithawi nak theh ahcun Pope cu Bacilica thawn pehpar aw mi Franciscan pawlkom Siangbawi tlawng ah a feh thu Vatican thuthang ihsin kan theih mi a si.

khrihfa a huatbiktu hindu minung 70 renglo nih khrihfa ah an lutmi hi khrihfa hna kan caah cun a sunglawi taktak ko.
Khrihfa kan tuanbia ah a dawtbik mi cu, zumlotu hna khrihfa ah luttar kha asi ko. Zumlotu hna nih khrihfa an lut tikah, khrihfa hna nih lawmhnak lianpi kan nei. Khrihfa hna kan mission cu, zumlotu hna kha khrihfa ah lutter kha asi ko.
Khrihfa hna Kan nitinhmi thil cu zumlotu hna cawnpiak I, khrihfa ah lutter kha asi ko. Tutan ah khrihfa hna nih Hindu mipi sinah thawngtha bia an chim I, hindu minung 700 lenglo nih pathian an hungtheih. Khrihfa hna nih zumlotu hna sinah mission an van tuan mi hi a sung lawi taktak ko.
An pastor pa zong nih a testiomonies a chim , bawipa nih thluachuah a kan pek I, kan mission tuannak cu thate in kan tlamtlinh kho tiah a chim. Pathian nih thluachuah a pek hna caah an tlamtlinh khawh nak asi.
Hindus hna nih an biaknak kaltak in, khrihfa an lutmi hi khuaruahhar loawk hrim a rak tha lo. India ram ah cun, hindu hna nih khrihfa hna hi, minung hmanh ah an rak rel hna lo. An duhning poh in an tuah hna. An thleihhrem hna an thah hna, an vuak hna. Nain tutan cu pathian nh khrihfa hna an mission tuannak ah thluahchuah a pek hna I, hindus tampi khrihfa ah an lut dih hna.
Hi hindus hna hi zungzal in khrihfa ah an hmun khawhnak hnga le pathian riantuan tut ha taktak ah an I chuahkhawhnak hnga, thlacam in bawm cio hna usih.

Chinram ih Covid 19 mina tambiknak Tedim le Hakha siizungpi ah Covid 19 nathrik hawlnak cet (Gene Xpert) ret thok a si thu theih a si.
Gene Xpert cet cu Hakha le Tedim ah September 9 in an ret thok ih Cet hmangthiamtu um bet a si le Ih-khun 100 nei mi siizung pawl ah retbet theih a si thu Chin State Minister for Social Affairs U Paung Lun Mint Thang in a sim.
Amah cun, “Gene Xpert cet cun veikhat zoh ah mi panga lawng a zoh thei ih a ṭuldan ih zirin hmundang khal ah rettheih a si. Tu ahcun Chinram ih Covid 19 mina tambiknak Tedim le Hakha lawng ah ret sung hrih a si.”
“Nathrik hawl ah veihnih zoh a si ṭheu. Veikhat cu mah le umnak cio ah zoh ṭha a siih veihnihnak cu Central pi ah kuat a si.”
“Tu dinhmun ah Covid 19 nat nei ding rinhlehmi an tam vivo ih centralpi khal a buai zet. Curuangah Chinram Ih-khun 100 um mi siizungpi pawl ah Gene Xpert cet ret thei sehla a ṭha zet. Nan, Cet hmangthiam an umlo ruangah a buai thlak zet” a ti.
Tu ah, Chinram ah Covid 19 mina 18 an um zo ih a tamsawn cu Tedim khua mi an si. Hivek dinhmun kan si ruangah Chinram cozah le Sii vaai thiamsang pawl in mipi hnen ah ralring cio dingin thu a than a si.

Thihna zet hi zawng a nunrawng tak zet. Mihring te dan theih rual a ni silo. Thailand ramah mipa naupang pakhat chuan a pa vuina senso atan tiin mittui nen livestream a nei.
Mipa naupang hi Chanadej Khiewsen a ni a, kum 12 a upa ani. A pa ruang vuina atan hian live concert in Facebook ah hun a hmang a, The Nation in an tarlan danin Khiewsen hi kum 5 a nih atang kawtthler ah Guitar perh in a zai tawh ani.
A school mamawh intum nan ten hun alo hmang thin a, mahsela thla reilo te liam ta atang khan a pa Cancer vanga damlo mek awmpui ngaiin mipui hma ah hun a hmang thei tawh lo. Online kaltlangin perform na hun a hman a ngaih phah.
A tirah a pa hospitall bill man atan a ruahman a, mahsela February 15 ah vanduaithlak takin a pa chuan a boral san leh si. Facebook kaltlang in an hun tawn mek chungchang chu lungchhe takin a puang a, a pa vuina atan pawisa thawhchhuah a mamawh ani.
Live stream a neih chhung hian lo thlirtu te hma ah insum tum viau mahse a thinlung leh rilru natna te chu a thup hleithei lo a, a mittui chu a tla deuh reng bawk. A live stream hi thehdarh a nih hnu ah mite thinlung a hneh hle. Facebook ah amah ngaihtuah tu zawng zawng te chungah lawmthu a hrilh a, lungngaihna in a chunga thla a zar chu tuarchhuakin chhel taka a awm tur thu a sawi ani. Engtik ni ah emaw chuan musician tha leh lar tak a la ni ngei ang.

“Sazaci No Er” tiah mi tam nih an auh i, ka pu hi 1930-2012 kum [kum 82] chung hi vawlei ah caan a hmang. A nunchung ah mi tampi fim chim in ca a thiamter hna. Mi tampi nun a sersiam. Mi tampi nih an upat. Mi tampi nih an dawt. Fa (a nung rih mi) pa kua a ngei i pa sarih hi taang hra an awng.
Ka pu nih hin bia a ka ruah pah tawn i, oi khat cu Mandalay TTC (Teachers’ Training College) an kai lio kong a ka chimh. Mah lio ah cun taang sarih awng cu “cataang saang” ah rak cang hna kaw
... 
theithu, dumchuak thil a tthing lo. Khual hmanh nih tampi an tem. Kannih hna chinchin cu khua kan hlumh ti lo hnu i kan tlun chel hmanh ah ar thau thau a kan thah. Fu thlum le ban-al cu chim hau lo. Hniarlawn vialte ah khualtlung an ngam nak bik hi ka pu inn a si lai tiah ka zumh. Lunglawmte i a tlunter lo mi khual an um lai tiah ka zuum hrimhrim lo.
Ka pu i mi le mah a kan dawt nak hi chim awk tampi a um nain ca i ttial ah cun tlawm tuk ah aa chuah ding a si ca ah izohchunh awk a tlak nak le a 
...
ang an nung i, anmah ruuninn te ah teem lo ing lo in “khua” dang ah an lan. Thlua an chuak. Thlua a chuak mi hna cu a chuak [rih] lo mi kannih hna nih ttah awk an um lo. Kanmah tu hi an ngaih kan chiat awk a si men lai ka ti.
Ka pu a dihdongh lai ah hin ka pi ttelifawn in ka cahchimh i, “Rak ikal ai kon seh; kan rong cio te lai i vancung khua i kan iton hlan ah mithi khua ah kan itong te lai” ka ti.

Zomi inn lam a ciah nuam te ading a vaihawm pih ding kisam!
March 21 :: Myanmar Belpawlgam pan in thuvai tuamtuam tawh inn le lo nusiate, Gambel zong mipi te inn ciah theih kik nading USD 17.4 Million tawh huhding vai UNHCR in Myanmar Belpawlgam Kumpite tawh thukimna “LoU” (Letter of Understanding) suaikai ta ding uh hi cih thu kiza hi.
Hih pen 2017 pan Kum 3 sung hi ding a, Zogam, Kaya Gam, Kayin Gam, Mon gam, Yakhine Gam, Shan Gam, Pagu gamke le Tanintaryi Gamke te ah kisem ding ci hi.
Gambel zong Belpawlgam mi te in a mau mimal ii lunggulhna le khentatna tawh inn lam hong ciah uh ciangin haksatna tampi nei a hih man in hih bang in UNHCR pan in a huh uh hi a, 2015 pan in nasep pawl khat kipan khin uh ci hi.
Kawlgam Tualgal hang in inn le lo nusia in a taikhia te, Gam nei lo dongtuak te, Gambelzong mi te cih bang in a haksatna anei mi tuamtuam te khempeuh tung ah hih huhna kipia ding ci hi.
Zomi te zong Galkap hun sung akipan in nuntak haksatna tuamtuam tawh Gam 3na zuan ding in India, Thai le Malaysia kizuan in ki om hi a, inn lam ciah kik nading haksatna zong tampi kinei hi.
Gamuk Kumpite, UNHCR te vaihawmna bek hi lo in, Zogam le Zomi minam makai te in mapang khawm in inn lam hong ciah kik nuam te lungmuang takin hong ciah theih nading a vaihawm ding kisam mahmah hi.

2. reporting.unhcr.org

A Nungmi Ruahsannak
In zaangfahnak a tum ruangah Jesuh Khrih cu thihnak ihsin a thoter ih nunnak thar in pe zo. Curuangah a nungmi ruahsannak in kan khat ih, Pathian in a minung pawl hrangih a retmi ro cu co dingah hngakhlap in kan um. (1 Peter 1:3-4)
Thuhmaihruai:
Tuih Nipi Ni hi “Leitlun Bawipa Zaanriah Nipi Ni (World Communion Sunday)” a si. Bawipa Zaanriah ih hmuitinmi cu zumtu pawl Khrih theihter ringring ih ruahsannak nung neihter ding hi a si. Bawipa Zaanriah cu Bawi Jesuh ih dinh tami a 
... 
heu hman uh singla, beidong loin, kan Bawipa Jesuh a rat saal tikah a sunlawinak kan ttawm ve ding timi a nungmi ruahsannak in kan khat ih kan thin a nuam ringring” a ti (1Pet.1:7). Curuangah tirhthlah Paul cun Jesuh Rat saalnak ruahsan hi “thluasuahmi ruahsannak (blessed hope)” a ti hngehnge (Titus 2:13).
- A Nungmi Ruahsannak ih Rahsuahmi pawl
“A nungmi ruahsannak” neih cu ziangso a tthathnemnak? Ruahsannak nung neitu ih nunram ah thluasuahnak tumbik cu “lungawinak” hi a si. Peter in, “Curuang
...
ih ruahsannak um loin a ngah thei lo,” a ti. Curuangah a nungmi ruahsannak neitu cun a ra saal dingmi Jesuh Khrih a ruahsan ruangah nitin a nunnak ah daithlang loin a ruahsanmi Bawipa hrangah rin-umzet, taimazet le in pumpe in nehnak laksawng – dingfelnak sui lukhum – ngah dingin hna a ttuan ding.
“Curuangah hnattuan thok dingah nan thinlung timtuah cia in um uh.Tiar cia in um uhla Jesuh Khrih a lang tikah nan ngah dingmizaangfahnak parah nan ruahsannak zate in bun uh.” – (1Peter 1:13)

SAN FRANCISCO : Leitlun hlasaknak le lamnak lam ah mi tamtak in sumpai tampi an lalut ih, cumi lak ah, tu naite ih larthar le can reilote sung ih Youtube ih video zohtu tambik sinak cotu, South Korea rapper Psy ih “Gangnam Style” ruang ih sumpai lutmi cu US $ 8 million a lan rero thlang thu Google chief officer Nikesh Arora cun a sim.
Yutube trends manager Kevin Allocca khal in, “hi Gangnam Style hi danglam zet ih hlasak mi le lammi asinak ah leitlun mipi in an zoh in an uar zet. Youtube ah 2012 July thla ah khan ret asi ih, can reilote sung ah mi tamtak ih zohmi lawnghman silo in, youtube hla hmuahhmuah lak zoh tambik sinak tiang a coban asi” ti in asim.
Hlasakthim dang pawl ih an sak mi, youtube ih an retmi tamsawn cu, kum tamtak hnu lawngah mi tampi ih zohmi asi nan, hi Gangnam Style lawngte cu thla malte sung ah mi tampi ih zohmi le youtube ih zohtambik hla sinak khal a nei hngal asi. 2012 July thla ih youtube ih retmi cun, December thla ah zohtu 1.23 bill nei in zohtu tambik sinak neitu Justin ih Baby cu a rak lan dah zo.

Tuisun, June 18 zinglam nazi 10:30 hrawngah khan KIO Headquarter umnak Laiza khawpi kiangah ralkap thazang tamsin ret tumin Kawl ralkap pawl mawṭawpi thawn an hung so rero lai cu ဒေါ့ဖုန်းယန် khawpi kiang ihsin KIA in an rak bawhthup ih an tinnak zawn an thlen fangah an rak kah ciamco. Kawl ralkap suamhmang pawl hi Manmaw lam ihsin rami an si ih mawṭawpi pa 7 thawn mipum 200 hrawng an si ဒေါ့ဖုန်းယန် thlenhlan deuh အူထန်ယန်ကျေးkhaw hnar ah KIA pawlin bomb an rak puah ih an rak kah ciamco tiin khawsungmi cun a sim.
“Kawl ralkap pawl hi Laiza khawpi kiang ခယာဘွမ် lam ah ṭanhmun khuar tum ih ra an si. Kawl ralkap lam hi mithi le hriamhma tuar an um ding kan zum. A cekci cu kan thei lo. Kawl ralkap pawl hin Alaw Bum sakhan ngahsal tum in nasa ten do an tum tla a si men thei, Manmaw Highway lamzinpi tluan ah Kawl ralkap mipum tam zet an darh aw vivo, ralthuam hriamhrei le ei-in pawl khal an phur nasa, tiin a sim bet.
Hivekin Kawl ralkap pawl ralkap thazang an seek bet vivo ih ralthuam le ei-in pawl tam zet Kachin ramsung ih an phurh lut ruangah KIA pawl hin an rak kahsiat sak cingcingnak a si. – Chin Net youtube ih tisuahmi Ca in siar duhtu hrang kan post mi a si.

Kan ram mamawh mil, kan ram mila ram kaihruai turin kan inbuatsaih a ni,” a ti bawk.PC Party chuan Mizoram Mamawh Zirhona hi huam zau zawk leh changtlung zawka kalpui zel tura tih a ni tih sawiin, zau taka mipui ngaihdan leh duh dan khawnkhawm a, mithiam te nena la sawiho leh thuai tura tih a nih thu an sawi bawk.

August 16
National Unity Goverenment nih August 15 in an zuar mi “Nwe Oo Thi” cu hmakhat te ah an zuar dih.
NUG ” အောင်လံလွှင့်ချီနွေဦးထီ” cu August 15 zanlei sml 4:00 in zuar an thok i sml 5:00 ah zuar ding a dih lak in an manh dih.
Sml pakhat le cheu chungah nikhat ca zuar ding an chiah mi cu an zuar dih. Ni dangah cawk khawh rih asi lai tiah website in an thanh.
” Tuni cu a nikhat nak ni a si caah 50000 lawng zuar kan timh. Pakhat ah 2000 si i, sing thongkhat man, nidang ah tamdeuh in zuar khawh ding ah kan i zuam lai, ralhrang kan tei hna hlan lo kan zuar lai caah mizapi hna lungsau tein le mizapi himbawm tein tangti hna usih” tiah NUG tutlai pakhat U Tin Htun Naing nih a chim.
” Nwe Oo Thi” cu zing sml 10:00 in zan sml 10:00 tiang facebook page messenger in cawk khawh si lai. A poh tu nih ” lak/hlut” khawh si lai.
Pakhat ah 2000 si lai i a tlawm bik 5, a tam bik 50 tiang thap khawh asi lai.
Zuar mi chung in 70% cu CDM caah si lai, 30% cu a poh tu laksawng asi lai.
Ref:MizzimaNews

Sunday, February 1, 2009
Singapore-ah Mizo kanpung zel
Singapore-ah Mizo kan pung zel a, tunthla ni 20 khan mi 10 vel zet Hotel Management / Hospitality course zirtur an raw thlen belh leh ta. Kal tharte Singapore Mizo Chirstian Fellowship ten kan lo lawm in, an zirna turah duhsakna sang ber kan hlan bawk a ni. Vawiin kan inkhawm-ah pawh a tam zawkin min rawn telpui nghal a kan lawm tak meuh meuh ani. Neitu chanchanga kan telho zel pawh kan duhin kan sawm nghal bawk. Vawiin kha anni ho zarah Mizo Christian Fellowship inkhawm tawh zawng zawng-ah kan tam ber tum niin mi 73 lai kan inkhawm thei a ni. A ropui kan tiin kan chhunzawm zel kan beisei.

India hmarchhaka Manipur-ah chuan tharum thawhna a thlen thar leh avangin army leh paramilitary force koh luh thar leh an ni.
Meitei leh Kuki te chu Thawhtanni khan state khawpui, Imphal-a New Checkon-ah an intibuai leh nia sawi a ni a. Buaina hi tual chhung bazara hmun inchuh atanga chhuak nia sawi a ni.

ten Scheduled Tribe status nih ve an phutna duh lova tribal-ten kawng zawh lian tham tak an huaihawt atangin buaina nasa tak a chhuak a. Chawlhkar khat chuang tharum thawhna thlengah mi 70 chuang an thi.
Buaina chhuakah hian in leh lo leh thil dang cheng vaibelchhe tel man hal chhiat a ni a. Mi tam takin an in leh lo chhuahsanin sorkarin awmna tur a siamah an awm phah a, tam takin state thenawm an pan bawk.

Thla tira buaina a chhuah hnuah khan army leh paramilitary force-te chuan an la awmchilh reng a, an patrol thin bakah civilian-te an pui thin.

Congress Thalai President Dr Lalmalsawma Nghaka chuan nimin khan Two-wheeler khalhtute thlavang hauhin nimin khan Aizawl Municipal Corporation (AMC) Commissioner K Laldingliana, MCS, chu a pisaah kawmin two-wheeler taxi permit pek belh tawh lo turin a ngen.
Dr Lalmalsawma Nghaka hian Aizawl khawpui dinhmun enin, tun dinhmunah sorkar hian two-wheeler taxi permit pek belh rih tawh lo turin Mizoram sorkar leh AMC Commissioner a ngen tih a sawi a. Tuna two-wheeler taxi khalhtute dinhmun leh an harsatna tawh mek hi rang taka enfiahpui an ngaih thu a sawi bawk.
Permit petu transport department-in AMC chu permit pek belh dawnin an rawn lo a nih chuan a kalphung lo hle tih a sawi a. “Permit tam tak pek belhin Aizawl khawpui a nghawng tur leh harsatna a thlen tur lam an ngaihtuah lo niin a lang. Aizawl khawpui hi traffic jam awm lohnaah kan siam ang titute hian ngaihtuahna an seng tak tak lo,” Dr. Lalmalsawma hian a ti.
Congress thalai president hian an sorkar laiin tam tak pek chhuah duh mah se, khawpui dinhmun leh eizawnna atana hmangtute dinhmun enin a tingam lo tih sawiin, two-wheeler taxi permit 691 pek chhuah anih thu a sawi a. Hetih lai hian, MNF ministry thla li chhung chauhin March 4, 2021 thleng khan two wheeler taxi permit hi 1,889 lai pek chhuah a ni tawh thu a sawi bawk.
AMC Commissioner K. Laldingliana hian Congress thalaiin an thu thlente chu AMC Mayor te nen an lo sawi ho dawn bakah, committee kovin an lo ngaihtuah tur thu a sawi a ni.

Mahse a mihringa hriat chian hmaa ngaihdan lo siamfel sa ngawt hi alo diklo leh thin. Tu ka sawi lo - Ka Driver ka sawi ve mai ani e. Ho angreng tak mahse ka nitin nunphung hrechiang ber tu leh min sawichhe theitu ani ve tlat. Helamah phei chuan pawimawh tak anni - Mahni lama tantir thei turin Union ho nen hian kan inchuh ani ber e. Keia tan lek phei chuan a pawimawh lehzual - Staff zinga senior ber annih tlangpui avangin mi tha leh misual, Posting Order siam dawna pawimawh em em - min hrilh theitu anni tlat. Ka Driver hmasa kha chu belchhung a sa hminsa, Pu Lalhluna lo khawizal tawh, kha ani tlata.
Rin anglo takin Pa tawngtlem leh fel em em, nau ang tak taka kan Nupa min enkawltu ani ta daih thunga. Ka Fapa a pianlai pawh khan sawi ngai miah loiin a tulna hmun apianga a tlan bakah zantin mamawhna thut a awm taka tiin khum pawh awmlohna a rawn riak phei ziaha. Tuna min sawn hnu pawh hian ka Fapa leh ka Nupui chuan anla ngai hle, engkim mai hi ka office hlan pawn alo tihfel sak dim diam thin. Helaia Mizo tamtak aiin ka ngaina, hnamdang leh hna hnuaihnung zawk thawk pawh nise.

Siamtu kutchhuak khawpui mawi chu,
A phai dung leh vang a mawi ngei e;
Tahchuan an leng thin Zofate,
Lungrual te a chen za laiin;
Unau hmelhai in chengrang an chawi,
Fam kaina doral a lian e.
Unau kan indovin tunge dingchhuak thei ang?
Suihlungrual ten insuihkhawm ila,
Chutin khuavel kan chhing ngei ang.
Hmelma iang a doral lo lian,
Thisen chhuak vang a Nunau mangang;
Authawn chuan Pa chan chang Zoram,
Lairil zawng chu a fan chhuak a;
Chhulkhat chhuak unaute inhai chu,
Zoram thim a na ngei e.
Hringnun ka chhiar Zofa leng ten,
Kan ram leh hnam tan sir kan sawn e;
Daidanna piah ramah chuan in,
Unau te chu kan intawk ang;
Kut insuhih in zai lai kan vawr za,
Nghilh theih hian kan mawi ne'maw.
Aw a sakhming nghilhthei reng hian,
Ka mawi dawn lo;
A sakhming koh a mawi ngei e,
Lo vul zella Zofate tan;
Aw Chhawrpial run kan ngai che.
Nghilhlohna par lo ni la.

Aizawl the 18th December, 2021: December ni 17, 2021 zingkar kangmei chhuak avanga Aizawl DC office chhe ta tukin khan Chief Minister Pu Zoramthanga chuan a hmunah a enfiah.
Chief Minister hian amah tawiawmtu Chief Secretary, Addl. Chief Secretary, Aizawl DC leg sawrkar hotulu pawimawh tak takte nen DC office chu an enho a. PWD hotute chu uluk taka a hmunhma zirchianga, sak that theih dan turte ngaihtuaha ruahmanna siam turin Chief Minister hian a ti a ni.
Chief Minister ho hian DC office insawnna tura ruahman lailawk MLA hostel chu en in, karleh mai a hawn tur MINECO Multi Level Parking a tlawh bawk a. Multi Level Parking building hi UD&PA hnuaia sak a ni a. 20.12.2021 hian hawn tura ruahman niin, GAD kuta hlan nghal tur a ni a. GAD hotute nena a hmunhma enchian hnu hian DC office nghah lailawkna atan MINECO Multi Level Parking hi remchang zawk an ti a ni.

Paletwa Ah Sianggakchia Thlahtu Tilawng Cu SAC Ralkap Nih An Kah I Siangngakchia 2 Nunnak A Liam! Chin ramkulh Paletwa ah siangngakchia a thlah/dongtu tilawng pakhat cu SAC ralkap nih an kah caah siangngakchia 2 nunnak liam i, midang 3 hrawng hliamhma an pu, tiah khuami nih an chim.
Cu tilawng cu Paletwa peng Yimawah (ရီးမဝ) khua in Tungmawah (တုံးမဝ) khua sianginn ah nitin siangngakchia a thlah/dongtu tilawng a si i, nihin chun cu a kir lei ah Hnamada(နှမဒါ) khua tilawng dinhnak hmun ah umhmun khuarmi SAC ralkap nih an kah, tiah mit hmutu khuami nih an chim.
Cu tilawng chung ah cun siangngakchia 10 hrawng an cuang i, SAC ralkap kahnak in ngakchia 2 cu an nunnak a liam, tiah theih a si. SAC ralkap nih tilawng an kah hnu ah, cu tilawng cu tiva kam ah dirter in tilawng khaltu le sianginn rianṭuantu hna cu an tlaih hna i tilawng chung ah a ummi ngakchia zong bia an hal hna, tiah min langhter duh lo mi pakhat nih media ah a chim. Credit : The Chin Post

Hpakanh Ah KIA Le SAC Ralkap Faak Ngai In An I Kap I, SAC Ralkap 25 An Thi!: Kachin ramkulh, Hpakanh(ဖားကန့်) peng Saezin(ဆယ်ဇင်း) ah KIA le SAC ralkap hna cu July 16 zinglei suimilam 7:00 hrawng in July 17 zinglei tiang faak ngai in an i kap i cu kahdohnak ah cun SAC ralkap lei 25 nak tlawm lo an thi lai, tiah tualchung mi nih an chim. Kaphnih kahdohnak ah SAC ralkap lei a thimi an tam caah nihin July 17 zinglei suimilam 8:00 tiang SAC ralkap nih raltuknak vanlawng hmang in kahdohnak an tuah, tiah theih a si.
“Kahdohnak cu nizaan July 16, zinglei suimilam 7:00 hrawng in Saezin(ဆယ်ဇင်း) khua he mengkhat tluk aa hlatnak ah a chuak i SAC ralkap lei a thimi an tam i, nihin July 17, zinglei tiang i kahnak thawng theih a si. Raltuknak vanlawng hmang in voithum tiang bomb an thlak, raltuknak vanlawng a kir hnu tiang ah kahdohnak a dai rih lo. Nihin zinglei tiang ah SAC ralkap lei 25 hrawng an thi cang,” tiah tualchung mi pakhat nih a chim.
Myinchain-NuaHṭukyi Lamcung Ah SAC Ralkap Motor Pakhat Bomb Puahhnawh A Si I, Ralkap 2 An Thi!: Mandalay ramṭhen, Myinchain-NuaHṭuakyi(နွားထိုးကြီး) lampi ah nihin July 17, tuzinglei suimilam 11 hrawng ahkhan NuaHṭukyi lei ah a kalmi, SAC ralkap 10 hrawng nih zulhmi motor hme pakhat cu bomb puahhnawh a ton caah, a chung cuangmi SAC ralkap 2 an thi, tiah NuaHṭukyi PDF nih an thanh. Mipi vialte hna nih thlacamnak in bawm cio hram hna u sih, kan ralkap pawl Bawipa nih teinak a pek hna i, ral kutin an him khawhnak dingah mah thawng a theimi poh nih cun second pakhat, minute pakhat te tal thlacam cio hna usih.

CAELTUEIH
(The Acts of the Apostles)
Caeltueih Cabu Kawng
Caeltueih cabu he Luka loh a tael bal. Cabu a tael pacuek te Luka Olthangthen a mingnah. Tekah cabu dongah Jesuh a cun lamkah vaan la a luei hil kawng a thui (chapter 1.1,2). Tahae kah dongah tah Jesuh hnukbang rhoek loh Jesuh ol a ngai uh tih diklai pum ah bibi kawng, a patangnah kawng khaw a thui.
Khrih olthang loh a phanah ram a tloe tloe kah ming khaw muep a tueng sak. Jesuh vaan la a luei phoeiah tah a hnukbang rhoek khaw a ngaihmang
... 
in muep a di mueh la Mueihla Cim neh n'nuem uh ni,” tila amih te a uen. 6 Te dongah aka tingtun rhoek loh amah te a dawt uh tih, “Boeipa, tihnin ah Israel ram na thoh koinih ta,” a ti na uh.
7 Tedae amih taengah, “Pa loh amah kah saithainah neh a khueh a tue khohnin he nangmih kah a ming koi la a om moenih. 8 Mat 28.19; Mrk 16.15; Luk 24.47,48Tedae nangmih soah aka thoeng Cim Mueihla kah saithainah na dang uh bitni. Te vaengah Jerusalem neh Judea pum, Samaria neh diklai khobawt duela kai kah lai
...
saeh,” a ti.
23 Te dongah Barsabbas la a khue Joseph [Anih te Justus lam khaw a khue] neh Matthias hlang panit te a pai sak uh. 24 Te phoeiah thangthui uh tih, “Soeprhaep boeih kah lungming Boeipa nang loh he rhoi khuiah tahae kah bibi neh caeltueih hmuen aka lo ham na tuek pakhat te phoe sak lah. 25 Amah hmuen la aka cet ham koi Judas tah palang coeng,” a ti uh.
26 Te phoeiah amih rhoi ham hmulung a naan uh hatah Matthias te hmulung loh a tlak thil tih a hlaikhat nah caeltueih la a tae thil uh.

SAC ralhrang uknak duh loin palik rian chuahtak in CDM a tuah i Mizoram ah aa dormi Pum Cin Mang (kum 26) cu Mizoram, Sihphir khua ah a nunnak a liam, tiah thawng kan theih.
Nihin zinglei sml. 11:00 hrawng ah zunput a kal hnu ah a paw fak ngaiin a um i sizung ah an kalpi. Asinain, a nunnak an khamh manh ti lo.
Pum Cin Mang hi Tedim peng, Suangpi khuami Pu Kam Za Htun i a fapa a si. A nulepa zong Mizoram lei in thawng an thanh cang hna.
Chungkhar nih Sihphir khua ah a rauk vuipiak ding in an hal hna bang in nihin zaanlei sml. 3:00 ah a ruak an thlak cang, tiah thawng kan theih. The Chin Journal
Relchap : November 6, November 9 le November 10 ah Thantlang inn a kaang chap mi Cazin
November 6 ah SAC ralhrang hna nih Thantlang khau chung Seihpiozi sang ah inn 9 an khangh chap. Hi khanghmi chungah Thantlang Baptist Association (TABC) tang um mi Panial Children House (PCH) ngaktah hna um nak inn 3 ai tel.
Cun November 9 ah Seihpoizi sang thiam ah inn 2 a kang chap. November ni 10 ah a kang than i, Seihpoizi sang thiam in inn 7 a kang chap.
A kang mi dihlak ni 5 chungah inn 18 a si an dih lak in Seihpiozi sang chung ummi inn an si. A tang lei ah kanghuhnak a tong mi inn ngeitu hna kan van langh ter.

Mizawng te ading AIDS natna kibawl nading huhna pia un, ci-in Pope Francis in thuumna nei
December ni (1)ni pen leitung bup AIDS ni ahihman in, Pope Francis in mipi tawh kalsim kimuhkhopna ah hih bangin thugen in han thawn hi.
"Mi tampi tak pen hih virus hangin gen theihna thuak a, leitung mun tuamtuam ah zong hih natna damna ding aki bawlzo nai lo mi tampi om hi, cih tuni in phawk ding thupi mahmha hi. Hihna a neite donna,khoihna leh kepna te bawlsak zawhna ding akipia khiazo te na hih dinguh kong lamen hi,”ci-in Pope in gen khia hi.
UN in a gen khiat na ah, AIDS virus aki pat 1981 kum pan natna akilawh Awn 32 hi a, 2018 kum in Awn 37.9 om hi, ci hi.
Thai gam banga numei kizuakna aomna mun te ah natna akilawh tam pen aa, 60% bang akilawh khin hi. Amau te kikep kibawl theih na'ng zatui zaha leh amun deihbangin kingahsakzo nailo hi, ci-in Rome Reports in genkhia hi.

Myanmar ram buaibainak ruang ah India ram a rak phan mi Myanmar ralzam mi hna cu an ram a daih hlan lo kan khirh than hna lai lo tiah India Union Home Minister Amit Shah nih a chim.
Mizoram Chief Minister Pu Lalduhoma le Pu Amit Shan cu January 4 ah New Delhi ah an i ton nak ah a tu bantuk in a chim hi a si.
“Myanmar ram athat hlan chung cu Myanmar ralzam hna an ram ah kan khirh hna lailo ti hi Mizoram mizapi nih kan theih piak hna she law ka duh” tiah a chim.
India ram chung ah hin Myanmar in ral a zam mi minung 60,000 leng an um i cu chung ah minung 50,000 cu Mizoram ah aa dor mi hna an si.

Ram chhung hmar lam khaw vawt chuan zual lam a pan zel a, Srinagar lamlian pawh vur tla leh ruah sur nasa avangin ni hnih khar a ni tawh. He lamlian hi Kashmir kal pawhna awm chhun a nih avangin khawsak phung pawh a buai a ni nghal deuh mai a, hmun thenkhatah phei chuan lei a min bakah, vur tawlh avangin, khaw thenkhat chu kal pawh theih lohin a awm mek a ni. Kashmir hmar lama Gurez leh Nougam bialah pawh vur tawlh avangin sipai 5 an bo mek a, a zawng turin sipai dang tirh mek an ni. India Meteorological Department chuan vur hi a la tlak belh zel dawn nia an hriat avangin, Line of Control leh a chhehvelah chuan fimkhur lehzual turin sipai-te hi an chah a ni.

Poland chuan Soviet hun laia siam Mig fighter jet pali chu Ukraine hnenah a thawn lut dawn a, tihian Nato ram nikuma Russia-in Ukraine a run atanga indo thlawhna pe hmasa ber a ni dawn a ni.
Polish President Andrzej Duda chuan ni rei lo te hnuah thlawhna chu an thawn luh tur thu a sawi a. Ukraine tan chuan air defence lamah puitu tur pawimawh a nih rualin indonaah erawh danglamna siam thei tura ngaih a ni lo thung a.
Ukraine parliament deputy speaker Olena Kndratyuk chuan ram dang te pawhin Pola
... 
stern jets te Ukraine hnena pek luh nghal ringawt chuan awmzia a nei lo tia sawi a ni bawk.
US President Biden erawhin US chuan Ukraine hnenah indo thlawhna a pek loh tur thu a sawi chiang thung a. Russia-in Ukraine a run tirh khan Ukraine chuan indo thlawhna hmantlak 120 vel a nei anga ngaih niin chung zinga a tam ber te chu hlui lam tawh Mig-29 leh Su-27 te an ni hlawm.
Poland president Duda chuan Soviet-era Mig 29 aircraft chu hmantlak tak an la kawl nual thu a sawi a. Ukrainian MP Kira Rudik
...
trike tum 16 an kalpui thu sawiin Russian personnel leh bungrua te an bei tiin a sawi a. Mahse, Ukraie-in a mamawh chu ‘fourth generation’ jets heng F-16 te ang te hi a ni tiin a sawi.
“Kawng tam taka hman theih an ni a, theihna an nei sang zawk bawk a, Ukrainian air force te tha zawka che thei tura siam thei an ni,” tiin a sawi.
Poland hi Ukraine thiantha niin military equipment petu lian ber a ni a. Poland hian Soviet hun laia indo thlawhnate chu American leh Korean model ten a thlak mek a ni.

Washington — US President Donald Trump nih Democratic party in MP a ngahmi nu pawl cu ‘a rawk dih cikcekmi le sualnak nih a tuammi nan ratnak ram ah va kir ulaw remh va bawm hna uh’ a ti bak ko hna.
Ramdang in a rami fa koko nih cutin khatin US cozah rianttuan seh tiah US mipi an chimhmi hna cu a duh bak lo.
Democratic party member pawl cu “Trump biachim hi miphun thleidan bak asi” tiah i fahsak takin an zai ve.
Zarhpini (US caan) ah President Trump nih, “a rawk dih cikcekmi ram pawl in a rami D
... 
 hna sehlaw remh va bawm hna sehlaw an i fai deuh lai,” tiah Twitter ah a ttial.
Trump nih an min cun a thliar hna lo nain, Democrat nu MP chungin New York um MP Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Minnesota um MP Ilhan Omar, Massachusetts um MP Ayanna Pressley le Michigan um MP Rashida Tlaib hi a timi hna si lai ti a fiang.
MP Ilhan Omar cu kum 1997 ah Somalia ram in Minneapolis khua (Minnesota state) ah ralzaam in a rak phan. Hnu ah Democratic party ah a lut i Hlutdaw Niam (House) ah MP aa cuh i a ngahm
...
ram cu US asi. America ah kan i tel vemi na cohlan khawh lo caah na thinhung mu. Na firtlei duh ah American thinphang in chiah nai zuam,” tiah MP Alexandria nih Twitter ah a leh.
Hlutdaw Niam (House) hruaitu nu Nancy Pelosi (Democratic MP) nih, “Trump bia chim hi ramdangmi huat bak si” a ti ve.
“Donald Trump nih American nu MP 4 an ram ah va kir hna seh a timi hi, ‘America A Liannganter Tthan’ a timi cu ‘America ah Mirang lawng umter tthan’ a ti duhnak a rak si peng ti a lang,” tiah a nolh chap.

Aggregate-in marks 88.66% a hmu phak a. Manipur pumpuiah 17-na a nih. HLS chun a lawmpui èm êm a. Hmatieng peiah hlawtlingna insâng tak a chang pei a ditsak a ni
Chun, hi Award inhlanna hun le hmun ding chu Liensangvung Award Trust remchang hun hunah ni’ng a tih
2. Hmar Literature Society Executive Committee thurel bawzuiin, June 25, 2011-a HLS Office Bearer inṭhung chun, Hmar ṭawng Workshop nei hun dingin, August 12-15, 2011 inkàr sung a ruot a. Resource Person dingin S.N.Ngurte, H.Zaneisang le L. Ruoivel Pangamte hai ruot an nih
3. Hi Workshop-a hin Hmar ṭawng hmang, inhnikna nei taphawthai ṭhangthei an tih. Participation Certificate khawm buotsai ni’ng a tih. High School, Hr. Sec. 4. Hmar ṭawng chungchàng, Hmar ṭawng Hmang Dàn le a dang dang ei sai ding a ni leiin, hi hun hi hun hlu tak a ni beisei a nih. Programme kimchanglem chu a hun tlung tawmah ei chanchinbu Hmasawnna Thar fethlengin hung insuo la ni’ng a tih

Tonzang khua Pu Thual Neng (Hautual) leh Pi Zel Ngem te sung panin 1893 kumin Tonzang myo ah suak hi. 1921 kum ciang Pi Dah Cing tawh kiteeng a, tapa 2 nei in a neulai in sihsuah hi. Azi Pi Dah Cing hongsih ciang zi kik in Pi Don Khaw Man la hi. Ta nei pih nawnlo hi.
Sangkahna: (1) 1906 kum Tonzang sia Po Ku nitak sangah kawllai sim hi.(2) 1914 kum Tedim Zolai sangah tan 4 dong zo hi. (3) 1915 kum Mandalay ABM sangah manglai sangkah hi. (4) 1916-1918 sung Insein Laisiangtho sangah kum 3 na dong 
... 
o hi.
Pawlpi nasepna: (1) 1924 kum pan sia Po Ku maban zomin tuiphum sia sem hi.(2) 1938 kum Cope Topa sih pan Rev Nelson hong tun dong Tedim ah Pastor sem.(3) 1942-1946 sung Rev Nelson te aciah sung sangmang te maban zom hi.(4) 1960 kum Tedim Cope Memorial Baptist Church thupha pia in honsak hi. (5) Cope Topa Zo Laisiangtho teikhiat pen a siamna zah siit lo in huh hi.

...
mawtaw lam tawh na ah lambu neu sem hi. (3) 1949-1954 kum sung mipi deihna tawh Tonzang khua Hausa sem hi.

Tutan Kalaymyo in Laitlang lei ah a kai cuahmah mi SAC ralhrang hi tluang tein Hakha an phanh khawh ahcun lungrawk ngai ngai a si la. Falam lei kan unau hriamtlai phu hna an rak kah i anrak kham bak ding an si. Ralttha tein kan pasalttha hna nih rak kham hna sehlaw an hriamnam vialte khi lak piak dih hram ko hna seh.
Nan lautuk sual lai caah photo le video chung i nan hmuhmi khi tank asi lo ti kha rak thei cio te u. Hi pawl hi cu tank nak in tihnung lo deuh mi armoured vehicle nak hmanh in a niam deuh rihmi “armoured car” an timi asi.
Tutan ralhrang nih Chin State i a vun katter mi hi kum 50 luan cio i Brazil nih a rak siammi “EE-9 Cascavel” timi asi. “Cascavel” tihi Portuguese holh a si i a ruul meicar (rattlesnake) tinak asi.
RPG 7 asiloah sniper tha deuh mi nih cun a kah ai tha lo tukmi asi. Asinain AK-47 le G-3 hrawng cun rak kap duh hlah u a hlan kho lai lo. Cascavel a derthawmnak bik cu tank taktak bantuk in a thir a chah lo, a mongtu khi a hmailei miakpi tang zawn ahkhin a um i RPG le sniper in puak viar in kah khawh a si hmaitonh tein cun.
Cun a tlang a harnak zawn tete khi a thazaang a dernak asi ti asi. Cascavel hi a chiatuk caah ramtha deuh nih cun an cawl lo, Iraq, Colombia, Libya le Myanmar hrawng lawng nih an hman duhmi a si.
Cucaah rak tihtuk duh hlah u, RPG in rem tein nan kah khawh tukmi asi ko a sasual nak deuh ah. Cun ralkap motor ngaingai siloin private truck/lorry hlan mi deuh an lo, chin duhmi cu ralkap motor hring pipi khi an si lo ti bia.

Hi eksiden tlung le inzawm hin motor neitu le motor eksiden in IN a delsie neitu han zanikhan inbiekna neiin inbiekremna an nei nghal. An inbiekremna dungzuiin, motor neitu han In a suksiet neitu hai kuomah Pathienni chenah Rs. 1 lakh an pek ding; pawisa sum inhlan huna hrepuitu dingin Kuki Inpi a President/Secretary annawleh mi pahni bek an hung thang ding ti le, In hluo tlak a ni tanaw leiin thiek nghal ni raw se ti hai a nih.
Editorial
Ei hriet seng angin sawrkar thawktuhai sinpui tak chu mipui rawngbawl a ni a, democracy hi mipui sawrkar ti a ni leiin “Government servant” ti khawm hi “mipui siehlaw” annawleh “mipui rawngbawltu” amani tina a nih. Sawrkar thawktu ei tihai hi sawrkar annawleh mipui han hlaw neia an ruoi an ni leiin, a ruoitu mipuihai inza ding le sie lal thiem dinga ngai an nih. Mipui boin sawrkar a um thei naw a, mipui um lovin sawrkar thawktu ding lak thei a ni naw bawk. Mipui zar lieu lieu a sawrkar thawktu hi an hung um thei a ni leiin indu annawleh intithei taka um ding chi chu an ni der nawh ti hi sawrkar thawktuhai hin a thar taka an hriet nuom a um. Mani nina hrietchieng le um dan tawk thiem hi a tul khawp el.

2015 Iranian Nuclear Deal ah US luhthan a timh ruangah Israel a sum kho tilo, ralrinnak a chimbak ko. Tehran tuk ding le cawlcanghnak kham dingin kan ralkap hna nih khuakhannak an kalpi cuahmah lio asi tiah Israel Army chief Lt Gen. Kochavi nih fiang ko in a chim cang. Tel Aviv university Institute for national security studies hmun ah biachimnak a ngeihnak ah Kochavi nih cun United state of America nih 2015 Iran nuclear deal ah luhthan a timhmi le a kir than mi cu a pawi tak tak si.
2015 nuclea
... 
le tawlrelnak dawnkhantu sawh sawh asi tiah january 26 ah a chim.US President Donald Trump nih 2018 lio aha rak chuahtak hnu le phihkharnak le hremnak fak taktak Iran a rak pek hnu in 2015 nuclear deal hi chimceih a tam ngai. Kan theih bantukin JCPOA hi Iran, US, China, Russia le Germany hna nih remnak minthut in 2015 ah an sermi arak si.
Mah remnak nih an i timh cemh mi cu Iran nih nuclear hriamnam a ngeih khawh lonak dingah Uranium a hman khawhmi limit tuah piak le Iran sinah hremnak an pektaw
...
onal Trump nih Iran timh le thiltuah mi a theih ruangah Iran nuclear deal in US cu a chuahpi. Iran nih cun Uranium thilri cu missile tuahnak caah le a pawngkam tapung pawl bawmhnak caah a rak hman diam.
Biden nih luhthan a timh tikah Israel a sum kho tilo, Biden nih nuclear deal ah luhthan a timh mi cu kan i timhtuahnak le riantuannak vialte dawn khantu asi. Iran nih nulcear programme a kalpi mi hi cohlan khawhlo mi thil tihnung asi. nuclear hriamnam karhtertu men asi lai ati. Credit: Daily hunt

Vawiin khan Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (RUSA) hma laknain Govt Lawngtlai College-ah zirlaite hma lam hun atana kawng inkawhhmuhna hun (career guidance & counselling programme) buatsaih a ni.
He hun hi Govt Lawngtlai College-a RUSA Coordinator leh Assistant Professor Dr C. Ramhnehzauva'n a kaihruai a. Principal Pu T. Thangthuama'n fuihna thu tawi sawiin, zirlai chuan nih tum leh beisei an nei vek a, chumi tihlawhtling tur chuan nasa taka beih a tul a ni, a ti a. Career guidance hun buatsaih chu hlawkpui ngei tum turin zirlaite chu a chah.
Resource person, Lawngtlai DIPRO Pu C. Lalhruaitluanga chuan zirlaite chu an zirna leh eizawnna kawnga hlawhtlinna chang tura thil pawimawh hrang hrang zirtirin, College an chhuahsan hnua an hna thawh theih tur hrang hrang te a hrilhfiah a. Mihringte career pawimawh ber chu zirna emaw, hna emaw ni lo va, nun zawk a nih thu sawiin, zirlaite chu fimkhur taka an nun hmang a, nun hlawhtling neih tum turin a chah.
He hun hmanah hian Govt Lawngtlai College-a 5th Semester zirlai, H. Rohmingmuana hnen atangin zai ngaihthlak a ni a. GLTC-a Head Assistant Pi Malsawmtluangi'n lawm thu sawiin, hun tihtawp a ni.

Tik Tok star hmeichhe pakhat chuan followers a ngah theih nan leh mi ngaihsan nih a tum luatna lamah a pasal Adil Rajput chu car-a chesuala thi angin dawt video a ti chhuak tih hriat a ni.
Tianga a pasal duhtak thi anga thuthang an hriat hnu chuan a fans-te chuan, a pasal (Adil) sun tur leh zahna lantir turin an in lamah an pungkhawm ta nghala, an chenna in an thlen chuan a lo dam reng tih an hre ta a ni. Hemi ni la la hian video dang tichhuak lehin a pasal chu dam thu a tarlang leh tih an sawi.
... 
i angin a Tik Tok video-ah a post a, a followers 2.6 million-te hmuh theih turin a pasal thih thu, thu dengkhawng tak chu a puang chhuaka, a video ah hian a tap nghe nghe a ni.
A video ah hian call a dawng tih sawiin a pasal, Adil chu car chesuala thi zingah a tel ve niin a sawia, “Adil a awm ta lo” tiin lungchhe takin a sawi chhuak ta a ni.
Geo TV in a tarlan danin Anil thih thu a nupuiin a Tik Tok video lama a puan chhuah hnu chuan amah ngaisangtu mi thahnem tak chu an chenna in kawtah an pung
...
a tarlang a ni.
Mahse, a fans-te chuan an chenna inah damin an hmu leh lawi sia, an nupa hian lar an duh avang leh ngaisangtu neih belh nan thawnthu an phuah chawp tiin fans-te pawh an thinrim hle a ni.
A hnuah video post leh nghalin a pasal Adil chu an pathian Allah in nunna dang a pe tih sawiin a lo dam leh niin a sawi leh ta a ni. He thil thleng avang hian an hming thanna aiin an tlakhniam phah ring an tam hle tih an sawi. An fans-te chuan an thinrimna thu bak engmah an sawi thei lo a ni ber.

Speakers Meet hi chawhma dar 10:15-ah tannin, Rev. Vanlalmuankima, Director, pastoral Department-in a kaihruai a, General Secertary Rev. Dr. R. Lalbiakliana’n Pathian hnena inkawltirna (Hunserh) hmangin thuchah tawi a sawi hnu-ah Resource Person Upa PC Lawmkunga’n Evangelistic Team Speaker te mawhphurhna leh mamawh te’ tih thupui hmangin Paper Presentation a nei a, Paper zirho zawh hian sawihona neih zui a ni. Vanlalmuankima kaihhruaiin Planary Session neih zui leh a ni a, tlai lamah chawhhlui kilhovin Meet an tin ta a ni. Tun tumah hian BCM Recognised Team 54 atangin Speaker – 43 an tel thei a, tel thei lo te hi damlohna leh harsatna lian tak avanga tel thei lo an ni.

HIV leh a kaihhnawih natna inkaichhawn theih chi hrang hrang chungchanga Tan In (Jail) leh khuahkhirh ngai enkawlna hmun hrang hranga hmalakna tur Integrated STI, HIV, TB & Hepatitis (ISHTH) Campaign chu Health Minister Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan niminpiah khan a hawng.
SAD Conference Hall-a he Campaign hawnna hunah hian Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan Mizoram a Central Jail pakhat leh District Jail kan neih ah te tang thei tur zat aia a leta tam an awm laiin hriselna lama h
... 
a nih thu sawiin, Department hrang hrangten tangruala hma an lakna tur ISHTH Campaign chu thla 6 hnuah a rahchhuah duhawm a lan ngei a beisei tih a sawi bawk.ISHTH Campaign hi June thla chhungin hman tur a ni a, thla khat chhung awh tur niin he Campaign in a tum ber chu Jail tangte, harsatna tawk leh khuahkhirh ngai enkawlna hmun hrang hrang a awmte HIV, TB, Hepatitis leh STI natna laka an inven theih nan leh natna nei ten enkawlna tluantling an dawn theihna tura ruahman a ni a, India ram puma h
...
wi hmunah pawh enkawlna tluantling a mamawh ten an hmuh theih nana buatsaih a ni. Jail tangte bakah Social Welfare & Tribal Affairs leh Women & Child Development ten an enkawl Home hrang hrang, Observation Home leh Ruihhlo ngai te enkawlna hmun pawh a huam tel dawn a ni.
He huna tarlan a nih danin kum 2021 chhunga rampum huapa tanin-a HIV leh TB hri kai thar chhut mi nuai 62.9 zingah, ram pum dinhmun za zela 1.93 anih laiin Mizoram chu sang berin za zela chhutin 26% a ni.

A Tlau Mi Indonesia Ti Lawng Thilri Cheukhat Hmuh A Si
A tlau mi Indonesia ti chung lawng (submarine) thilri cheukhat hmuh a si
Kan hnu cacawn nithum April 21 ah a tlau mi Indonesia ti lawng thilri cheukhat cu hmuh a si i, dam in a um rih mi hna bawmh dingin khua kan khan lio a si tiah Indonesia ralkap nih thawng an thanh.
“Ti chung lawng a hnu bik a umnak hmun pawngah kan hmuh mi thilri pawl cu kan ti lawng thilri pawl an si tiah zumh a si. Mah thilri pawl hi rih nak (pressure) a um lo ahcun lawng chungin zeitik hmanh ah a chuak kho ding a si lo” tiah Indonesia Vanlawng ralkap bawi Haddi Tjahjanto nih a chim.
An hmuhmi thilri pawl ah Lubricant (thil a naltertu). Torpedo missile vennak thil hna an si i, an hmuh mi thilri pawl hi ti rihnak faktuk in a nenh lo ahcun a chuak kho ding mi an si lo tiah Indonesia ralbawi zik pawl nih cun an chim.
Mah ralkap tichung lawng hi tichung metre 800 tluk ah an hmuh mi a si. Lawng chungah lawng ralkap 53 an tel i mithiam pawl nihcun lawngchungah a um mi oxygen zong a dih cang kho men cang lai an ti.
Ti awng riantuan tu Wisnu Subiyantoro farnu Ratih Wardhani nihcun thil a that khawhnak dingah thla kan cam cuahmah ko. Lawngchung ummi vialte an him lai tiah zumhnak kan ngei tiin a chim.

Bollywood star, Rishi Kapoor chu tukin khan Mumbai-a damdawi in pakhatah cancer natna vangin a thi a, kum 67 mi a ni. (Pic:indiatoday.in)
‘Bobby’ leh ‘Chandni’ star Rishi Kapoor hian kum 2 chhung cancer (leukemia) a tuar a, nikum khan a cancer inenkawl hian New York-ah hun tam zawk a hmang a, September thla khan India-ah a rawn kir a. Kumin February thla khan ṭum hnih damdawi in-ah luhpui a ni a, a hmasa zawk chu New Delhi-ah niin, a hnuah Mumbai-ah luhpui leh a ni a, Delhi-a damdawi in-a dah a nih hnu hian Kapoor hian Twitter-ah Delhi boruak bawlh hlawh vanga damlo a nih thu a sawi a, doctor-te pawhin a chuap ṭhalo-in pneumonia thlen thei dinhmunah a ding niin an sawi bawk.
Nimin khan a unaupa, Randhir Kapoor chuan Rishi Kapoor hi damdawi in-a dahluh a nih thu sawiin, cancer natna a neih thu leh thawk lamah harsatna a neih thu a sawi a, tukin dar 8:45 am IST khan a boral zui ta a, nimin lawkah Bollywood star tho, Irrfan Khan chu cancer vang bawkin a lo kal tawh bawk a ni.
Rishi Kapoor hian a nupui Netu Kapoor bakah a fapa, Ranbir leh a fanu Riddhima-te a kalsan a, Kapoor chhungkua-in thuchhuah an siamah Rishi Kapoor chu “hlim takin a awm reng” tih leh “a hun tawp thlengin doctor-in a vil reng” tih an sawi a, tuna rampuma lockdown vanga khuahkhirhna hrang hrang kalpui mek bawhchhe lo turin a fan-te, amah ngainatute leh an ṭhenrual ṭhate chu an chah a ni.

North Korea hian June thla hian spy satellite hmasa ber a kapchhuak dawn a ni
All in one
Fri, June 2, 2023
North Korea state news agency KCNA chuan North Korea state news agency KCNA chuan June thla hian a hmasa ber military intelligence satellite a kapchhuak dawn a, hei hian US sipaite thiltih dan direct-a a enfiah dawn a ni.
KCNA chuan US leh South Korea-te joint military exercise hi indonaa kal tumna fimkhur lo taka lantir a nih thu a tarlang.
U.S leh South Korea hian tun hnai thla engemaw zat chhung khan sipai exercise eng emaw zat an nei tawh a, kar hmasa khan live-fire exercise neih tawh zawng zawng zingah a lian ber a ni.
Ri Kyung-chol chuan heng sipai exercise-te hian Pyongyang-in sipai thiltih dan chu a hun takah a enfiah thei a, information a la thei a ngai a ni, a ti bawk.
North Korea chuan military intelligence satellite siam hna chu zawh fel a nih thu leh, kahchhuah tura inbuatsaihna hnuhnung ber chu hruaitu Kim Jong-un-a’n a pawmpui tawh thu a lo puang tawh a ni.
Thuchhuahah hian satellite kahchhuah hun tur chiang tak tarlan a ni lo a, mahse Japan hian May 31 leh June 11 inkara kahchhuah tum a nih thu hriattir a ni a, hei hi Japan-in a missile defence system a buatsaih theih nan a ni.

The Chinland Post | 2022 September 9 – Karenni (Kayah) ram September a zarhkhatnak chung kahdohnak ah SAC ralkap 18 an thi tiah KNDF nih September 8 ah a thanh.
September a zarhkhatnak chungah SAC ralkap pawl cu Demoso le Hpruso khua hna ah thazang an chap i mawṭaw pawl in eidin phorh an i zuam tiah KNDF nih a thanh.
September 3 ah Demoso peng in Hpruso peng lei ah eidin a rak phorhmi mawṭaw 5 cu KNDF battalion 15 nih an kah hna i SAC mawṭaw 1 a rawk, ralkap 3 an thih caah an mawṭaw pawl zong an
... 
ion 15 nih an kah hna i SAC ralkap 2 an thi.
September 4 zongah Hpruso peng Htipawsu le Dawngekhu ah hmunhma a khuarmi SAC ralkap cu KA, KNDF Battalion 4, 5, 15 nih an kah hna i SAC ralkap 6 an thi.
Cun KNDF battalion 15 nih Hpruso peng Kadala khua pawngah hmunhma a khuarmi SAC ralkap an kah hna i SAC ralkap 2 an thi.
Demoso peng Ngwetaung khuathar pawngah hmunhma a khuarmi SAC ralkap cu KA le KBDF battalion 10 nih an kah ṭhan hna i sml 4 hrawng a raumi kahdohnak chungah SAC ralkap 1 a thi i tam
...
 SAC ralkap pawl cu KA le KBDF battalion 21 nih an kah ṭhan hna i SAC ralkap 3 an thi i 2 fak piin an i hliam.
Cu kahdohnak ah KNDF nih hriam 1 le zen cheukhat an lak khawh.
September 3 ah Htaitawmu pura tlang ah hmunhma a khuarmi SAC ralkap pawl cu KA, KNDF battalion 3, 9, 11 nih an kah hna i SAC ralkap 1 a thi.
Karenni dothlennak vialie chung le Pau dothlennak chungah a nunnak a liammi ralkap pawl vialte cu September 8 Karen Martyr’s Day ah upatnak kan in pek hna tiah KNDF nih a langhter chih.

Satu: Pensy B.Lalthangliani
Tawnmang silo eng aikaih nge,
Ka lo lawi he run thim riai;
A sakhming an damna run maw,
Pialral rahka iang si thinlai an.
Chhing mitthla an a cham reng e,
He run beltu famchang tawh te;
Hrilh in ti hai dawn a sei ngei,
Thinlai a nghawr dim e.
Setan dawihlo zuk leh hmuam tin,
Ka laitha min thliah tu hi;
Zu in lo, hmuam lo ni ila,
Ka bel bik lo'ng cancer run hi.
Tunah erawh pialral rahkha,
Bei nge sei aw run dung tiin;
Chemo, radiation hlo te nen,
Hnukchah dawn thleng pawh in.
Biak lai Pathian tan ni si lo,
Ram leh hnam tan pawh ni si lo;
Zuk hlo hmuam tin vang a fam chu ana lua e,
Siamtu hmai khap loh reng a na lua e,
Nunhlu i pam hma e,
Ka lei taksa Siamtu chenna,
Zuk leh hmuam a ti bawrhbang tu;
Hrem zia reng hi kan lo ni e,
Kan nat pui ngial e Zoram hian.
Au in ka sawm leng zawng te,
He silhfen hlui hi hlip ang u;
Zuk leh hmuam tel lo a rawngbawl in,
Khua a tlai hma ngei hian.

Hei chu a mualpho thlak hle mai. Odisha state a Titilagarh block of Balangir district a thingtlang khaw pakhat Kuturakend a cheng te chuan an khua a Tui luanna lui kawr chu Sorkar thuneitu sang zawk te hnen ah lei (bridge) dawh sak tura an ngenna a hlawhtlin theih loh vangin an mahni in thing leh mau hmangin lei an indawh chawp.
Khua a cheng ten an sawi dan chuan heng tui luan kawr te hi fur ah chakkhai an lamna kawng ah harsatna a siam sak fo thin niin an sawi. Ruahsur nasat phei chuan tui hi 6 feet a sang te a ni thin. Hei vang hian hmun dang pan thei lo in naupang ten School an kal theih loh bakah khaw mite pawn thil tul tak, damlohna thil pawh nise dai kaih theih mai a ni ngai lo.
Government te hnen ah lei (bridge) dawh sak tur hian vawitam ngenna pawh an thlen tawh a, mahsela an ngenna a hlawhtling thei ngai lo. Beisei tur awm lo beisei ve reng ai chuan tiin khaw mipui te chuan thing leh mau hmang in lei (bridge) hi an dawh a ngaih phah a ni.
“Lei siam a nih vat theih nan hian thu min tiam a mahse a tak ram a thleng thei lo. Awlsam tak a ruahsur nasat karah pawh zin veivah a awlsam zawk nan khaw mite chuan beihpui kan thlak ta a ni” tiin khua a cheng Tejraj Bhoi chuan a sawi.
Kuturakend khua hi ramngaw chhah tak a awm a nia, tui luanna kawr hi hmun 3 lai niin kawng pawh a chhe hle bawk a ni. Sub collector te hnen ah hian tum eng emaw zat ngenna an thlen tawh bawk.

Mizoram-ah COVID-19 hri kai hmuh thar leh a ni
Kumin-ah Mizoram atangin COVID-19 kai mi pakhat hmuh thar leh niin hei hi Covid Variant thar, JN.1 nen a inkaihhnawih em tih enfiah turin Sample thawn tum a ni.
Health Department hotute chuan COVID-19 vei an hmuhchhuah thar hi a hritlan avangin engemaw awm palh thei tih thu ah mahni inhriatchian nan tia ZMC-a inendik tir a ni tih sawiin, Zirtawpni khan COVID-19 a vei tih finfiah a ni a. Amah hi In lamah a inenkawl a, COVID inkaihhruaia CAB tha taka zawm tura hrilh a nih thu sawiin, tunhnai ah zin veivahna a nei lo tih an sawi a. Hetihlai hian tunlaia COVID Variant thar, JN.1 a ni em tih endik turin National Institute of Biomedical Genomics, West Bengal-ah Sample thawn tura buaipui mek a nih thu an sawi a ni.Kumin a COVID-19 vei hmuhchhuah thar hi nikum, 2023 October ni 19 hnua Mizorama COVID vei hmuhchhuah leh hmasak ber a ni a, tun dinhmunah Mizoram-ah Sample enfiah tawh zawng zawng 19,96,779 a ni a, heng zinga 2,39,563 chu hri kai tih finfiah an ni a, mi 734-in an thihpui tawh a ni.

ghnak chungah a round hnih nak ah Aung Lah nih a tei. Mah ni ah Japan pa cu Aung La nih a chuihnak nak zawn a hnakruh pahnih a pelh pin ah a cuap ah thi laanghnih an dawp piak mi cu a tei mi pa Ken Hasegawa nih i pheh lo tein pumpak a hman mi Account ah a tar ve.
Tutan Aung La N Sang nih teinak a hmuh cang ka in Heavyweight champion a si mi Brando Vera nih a zuamcawh(singkhaw) i Aung La N Sang nih a cohlan ve caah aralaimi October thla ah an i thong than lai.

ht i thongh khawhnak ding caah (pound 125/56.7 Kg) si a hau, cu bantuk in Featherweight caah (pound 145 in a cunglei/65.8 Kg), Bantamweight caah (pound 135/61.2 Kg), Lightweight caah (pound 155/70.3 Kg), Welterweight caah (pound 170 in cunglei/ 77.1 Kg), Middleweight caah (pound 185 in cunglei/83.9), Light heavyweight caah (pound 205 in cunglei/93.0), Heavyweight caah (pound 265 in cunglei/ 120.2 Kg) le Super Heavyweight caah cun pum rihzan ri khiah nak tuah a um ti lo. Raldohnak Asiloah Dohthlennak Teinak Cu Mipi Kut Ah A um Tiah NUG-Vuanci Nih A Chim! Raldohnak asiloah dohthlennak teinak cu mipi kut ah a um i, pehzulh in kan tuah tuan ahcun teinak cu kan hmuh hrimhrim lai tiah NUG cozah nuhrin covo lei vuanci simi U Aung Myo nih a chim.
Astralia ram ah a phanmi Kawlram chuak tefa hna nih duhlonak langhternak an tuahmi ah telpi in a chimmi cu, teinak kan hmuh hrimhrim lai tiah fek tein, lungrual tein pehzulh in kan tuah tuan cio ahcun teinak kan hmuh hrimhrim 
... 
 dingmi thil pakhat cu, biadik le a hmanmi thil tha kan tuahnak ah tuanbia nih a kan pekmi rian cu kan lim hrimhrim awk a si. Cucaah mah pumpak cio ah thisen daihter hrimhrim loin kan tuah tuan ahcun teinak kan hmuh/co hrimhrim lai.
Teinak cu kanmah kut cungah a um ko nain cu teinak cu pehzulh in kan tuah tuan lo ahcun kan sungh bak ko lai. Asinain teinak cu pehzulh in kan kalpi i, lungrual tein hmunkhat ah Kawlram thatnak ding caah kan tuanti hrimhrim lai timi lungput le ruahnak kan ngeih ahcun
...
.
Atu tiangah hramhram uktu SAC ralhrang nih Kawlram cu hriamnam in uk ding/hruai dingin aa zuam cuahmah nain teinak a hmu kho lo i, a lamkip in sunghnak lawngte in a khat cang timi cu kan dihlak nih hmuh dih le theih dihmi a si caah mipi nih teinak lungput he hmailei ah pehzulh in tuanti dingin U Aung Myo nih forhfialnak a chim hi a si. Kum 2021 Dec 10 ah rak tuahmi “daiziar tein um” duhlonak langhternak ni ah Yangon Suu Lee lampi hmanh mahti hin a si.
Ref: The Federal Times

Mizoram in Lok Sabha-a Seat khat a neih luah tura MP inthlanpui neih tur atana inthlanna chuh tum te tana hming pekluh hun chu Vawiin hian a tawp dawn ta a, hriat theih china he inthlan chuh tur hian mi pali ten Nomination paper an thehlut tawh a ni.
Lok Sabha inthlan chuh tur hian MNF Candidate, C. Lalrosanga chuan Nomination paper thehlut hmasa berin Zirtawpni khan Independent-a inthlan chuh tur Lalhriatrenga Chhangte chuan Nomination Paper thehlut lehin Inrinni khan Independent bawka inthlan chuh tur Lalnghinglova Hmar chuan Nomination Paper a thehlut bawk a, Independent-a chuh tur, Lalthlamuani pawhin Nomination Paper thehlut tawhin ani hi Chhinlung Israel People's Convention pawl hotupa, Lalchhanhima Sailo nupui a ni.
Nomination a file zawh hnua chanchinbu mite zawhna chhangin Lalnghinglova Hmar chuan tun \um MP inthlan tur chungchangah BJP leh BJP lo zawng inbeihna tur a nih thu a sawi a, CAB ‘16 duh lovin a tihtlang tum BJP thawhpui vote tlat chu thil nihphung nia a hriat loh thu a sawi a. MP inthlanah a tling a nih chuan CAB piah lamah Look East Policy conectivity leh kut-hnathawktute hmasawnna tur ngaihtuah chu a ngaih pawimawh hmasak tur a nih thu a sawi.

“Rakhine State tih lohah chuan Chin State hi an nasa ber a, UN Agency te pawhin tanpui an tum a. Township 9-a chhawmdawl tur chuan thil harsa tak a ni a, NUG-ten thlipui
... 
anpuina a la thleng bawk si lo, theih tawpa tanpui an ngai a ni” tiin U Pyi Min chuan a sawi zui a.
May 14 khan MOCHA thlipui avangin Chin State pum puiah sakhaw in, zirna school, chek in telin chenna in (Building) 3000 chuang a chhia, Matupi, Paletwa, Mindat leh Kanpalet township-ah te chhiatna a thlen nasat thu hriat a ni bawk.

...

Thailand, Lopburi khua ih zawng pawl cu rawl cuhaw in lamziin pi ah an buai ṭheu ih khawsung mipi ṭhenkhat cu leng suak ngam loin, innsung ah an kherhkhumaw.
13th-century lai hrawng ih dinmi khua hlun zet a siih, kum tin, tourists vehvaitu thawngteel an um ih cuih tourists pawl cun zawng pawl ih ei-in ding banhla, thingthei an pek ṭheu.
Asinan Covid – 19 ruangah an khua vehvaitu tourists an um nawnlo ih zawng pawl khal rawl pektu an nei nawnlo ruangah rawl cuhaw in a rualrual in an sualaw ṭheu.

... 
l ih zawng pawl sawn kha zalen zetin an um. An eibang thil ṭuktak le an ek pawl cu duhduh ah an hlon, an thawh ih a rim a sia ngaingai. Abikin ruahsur caan ah a rim celhawkṭha si lo” tiin AFP hnen ah a sim.
Zawng rual pawl cu khawsung um mipi in ti thei tawkten rawl an pek phahphah ṭheu ih an rawl pek mi thilthlum, cereal, theiti pawl cun zawng pawl a ti cak ih sex lam tiang in an cak sinsin ruangah nau tamzet an hring ih an karh sinsin. Kum 3 sungah a let rorin an karh ih tuah 6000 an kim zo.
“
...
kap ah zawng thicia ruak khal a tam zet an kiang nai ih va feh pohpoh cu an rak sual mei” tiin khawsung mi cun a sim.
Khawsung mipi harsatnak cu cozah lam in theitawk suah in an bawm. Zawng pawl cu itthatsii thawn an kap ih karhzai theilo, nau hring theilo dingin nau-inn an phitsak hnu ah an taksa par ah hminsinnak tattoo an cuk ih an thlahsal.
Tu khalah Thailand wildlife department in zawng nu pawl ih nau-inn phitsaknak an nei rero ih tuzarh sungah 500 tal phitthei an tum a si.
ref:Guardian,ATS

Swachh Survekshan Grameen 2019 Awards (SSG 2019) hi Department of Drinking Water and Sanitation, Ministry of Jal Shakti hnuaiah 14th August - 30th September 2019 chhung khan neih a ni a. He programme-in a tum ber chu thingtlang khuate faina lama inelna a ni.
He inelna atan hian tehfung hrang hrang hman a ni a, field survey leh online report-te atangin India rampuma state leh district titha te thanchhuah a ni. Field Survey ti tur hian Govt. of India chuan 3rd party inspection team IPSOS Pvt. Ltd.
... 
 leh (2). North East Zone-ah te pakhatna (first position) dinhmun a luah a. India rampum huapin pathumna (third position) a ni bawk a ni.
Heng bakah hian india rampum huapa district 683 atanga tithate thlanchhuah leh an ni a. North east Zone-ah : Pakhatna - Kolasib district, Pahnihna - Serchhip district leh Pathumna - Aizawl district te an ni a. India rampum huap ang chuan Kolasib district hi 33-na niin, Serchhip district 53-na, Aizawl district 60-na, Champhai district 82-na, Lunglei district 86
...
a, New Delhi-ah neih a ni a, lawmmante hi Union Minister Pu Sadananda Gowda chuan a hlan a ni.
SSG 2019 hi Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) hnuaia hmalaknate tehna a ni a, Mizoramah chuan SBM(G) hi PHE Department hmalakna pakhat a nih angin, SSG 2019 Awards dawng tur hian PHE Department aiawhin Er.H.C.Lalnunzira, Mission Director, SBM(G) hovin District aiawh Er.H.Lallianmawia, Sr.EE Kolasib District, Er.F.Sanglura, Sr.EE Serchhip District leh Er.C.Zothantluanga, EE Aizawl District te an kal a ni.

“BJP leadership te Prime Minister pawh telin Malviya thusawi demawm tak chu an pawm tur a ni lo. BJP te hian kan ram history leh leaders te an zah takzet a nih chuan Malviya hi a nihna chelh aTanga chawlhtirin India mipuite hnenah ngaihdam dil rawh se” tiin Congres
... 
h chu politics a thutlukna an siam kaihhnawih avanga tualthi an ni” tiin Malviya chuan a sawi a ni.
Jairam Ramesh chuan Malviya thusawi chu awm ang lo tak a nih mai piah lamah historical events a thil duhawm lo lutukte tun huna politics a hamThat nana lak tumna a ni a ti a.
“Khatiang thusawi khan kan hruaitu ropui tak tak te memory zahlohna a nih mai piah lamah he ram politics kalzel turah thil duhawmlo leh demawm tak thlentu hmahruai a ni thei” tiin Congress MP chuan a sawi a. BJP te hian India
...
chuan a sawi.

“Mahatama Gandhi, global symbol of peace leh father of the nation kha huatna leh inThendarhna ideology kalpuia pawl indin te leh tuna BJP te philosophical guide in a tihhlum a ni. Chutihlaiin Congress te chu din a nih aTang phatin principle of truth and non-violence chawinungtu a ni thung” tiin Jairam Ramesh chuan a ziak bawk.

Premier League hmaikal vialte lak ah minthang a rak simi Arsenal Captain hlun Henry nih tukum season ah a tlingbik Premier League hmaikal pakhat a chim. A nih cu tukum chung ah goal 32 tiang a thun kho mi Salah a si lo, Spur caah goal 30 tiang a thun kho mi Hery Kain zong a si fawn lo Liverpool Hmaikal a si mi Firmino tu a si tiah a chim.
Firmino cu tukum season Liverpool caah Premier League goal 15 tiang a thun khawh i, a hawi le caah goal 7 a siam piak hna. Goal a thun mi lak ah Mancity hnukha
... 
one cu body hmang in goal a thun mi a dawh bik tiah mipi nih an ti. Cun Liverpool manager Klopp i Gegenpress celh ning ah a tha bikin a cawlcang kho i, amah ruang ah an i celh ning zong zoh a nuamh khunnak a si.
Sky Sport ah Henry nih “Firmino cu hnukham pawl kar lak i a cawlcangh ning a that caah M.Salah zong a duh ning in a cawlcangh khawh nak a si. Cucaah Farmino cu tu lio Premier League ah a thiam bik hmaikal a si ko. Mah ti ka chim ruang ah goal thun a thiam bik ka ti duhnak si lo, a thazan
...
 ka ti duhnak zong a si fawn lo. Sihmanh sehlaw hmaikal pakhat nih ngeih a herh taktak mi thiamnak tling tein a ngei mi a si” tiah a chim.
Firmino cu a luan cia kum ah ramkhat celh tti hawi a si mi Courtinho he an i celh ning an rak tha tuk. Courtinho nih club dang a thial tak hnu zong ah Mane, Salah hna he tha deuh chinchin in le zoh dawh tak in a celh ti kho mi an rak si. Cucaah goal a thun mi record, midang ca goal a siam piak mi record hna zong tukum ah a that khun nak a si.

 in na on piak khawh hna.

an tuahmi kutka a si.Vanlawng luhnak kutka cu a um ve ko nain khualtlawng pawl nih arannak in an chuah duh tik ah hi emergency exit hin rangtak in chuahkhawh a si.

UPA PAUSING HAUZEL TANCHIN TOMKIM |By: H Thangzamuan, Bungmual
Thumasa: Phaitong EBCC Centenary Souvenir Editorial Board in ka pu Pausing Hauzel tanchin tomkim gelh di’n hon sawl ua, hampha ka kisa. Ka pianma thu ngen ahih ziakin haksa ka sa hi. Himahleh, ka pu Taivel Hauzel laibu gelh “ KA KHUAL ZINNA” chih leh Phaitong EBCC Golden Jubilee Souvenir te enkawm in, mi khenkhat te’ gensawnte pansan in theih dandan in kon gelh ahi. Ka pu tanchin gelhna a hon kithuahpih ka gang Rev V Thangsuan leh ka
... 
hou in na kitengsak hi. Nupa nuamsa leh kithutuak ahi ua, himahleh lou a kuan chiang un bel a zi tawh kiton khawm utlou nakin, Pu Pausing pe’n amah chauhin pai vungvung naksek kichi hi.
UPA ORDEN TANNA: Pu Pausing in kum `1941 in Senvon (Konzar) khua a khawmpina ah orden na tang hi. Amah sawm a khat pe masa pawl hi a, a om na peuh ah taima leh chi taktaka saptuam enkol mi ahi hi.
THUM MI AHIHNA: Pu Pausing tuh Pathian kianga thum gige mi ahi hi. A tenna peuhah lou a kuan chiangin nnasep patma a 
...
vang heu a Pu Pausing te lawi in sapla toh ana dawn unchin “Goseuri sal sking, lungtu rei o golking, Go se da king. Sen him viktoria angtoria bol king ro se da king” chi a sa zaizai mai hi didan uh hiin. Huai tuh sapla a Phaitong saptuam (bial pumpi le hi maithei ahi) in sap a dawn masakna pen uh ahi kichi. A la diktak hiai dan ahi:
God save our gracious King,
Long to reign (Our) Noble King,
God save the King.
Send Him victorious,
Happy and glorious,
Long to reign over us,
God save the King.
