By Salai Zathang: Chinram ah CNLD Candidates Pawl Cu Ṭhutnak Duh ah Asi Nan Ti Maw? Chim/holh le phuan ka duh bak nalo in, NLD ttanh mi pawl zeihmanh a thei lo le hngakchia le Tar bantuk kan tamtuk caah ka hngaihchia i Chin ka sinak thisa nih a hlam caah ka van ttial ve ko lai. (Comment lawng nih a tlinh kho lo)
A tu kan Chimram i NLD Candidates aicuh dingmi 10% ah 9% khi tthutnak duhmi lawngte an asi ti hi fiang hram uh sih! Hlanlio ruahnak bantuk in Chinram an dawt caah asi kan hei ti ngam rih
... 
phun lungput a nei taktak mi lawng nih dawh CNLD Candidates ah izuam khawh asi cuh! CNLD in Candidates vialte nih khin tthutnak mit lawng an au cun mu, NLD Candidates ah an icuh kho tuk ko cuh! NLD Candidates nak in a fiit deuh mi CNLD candidates nih ziah tthutnak an duh ahcun NLD ah izuam khawh asi lo maw? Asi tuk! Khua hi faak deuh in ruat deuh hna usih!Time and Space zong hi zohthiam hna usih.
Chinram atu kan CM asi mi, Pu Lian Luai hna khi USDP sit taktak dawh asi khih. Mandalay Taing, Sinhk
...
cuh.
Mah Miphun Party CNLD tthatnak hmanh a hmu kho rih lomi Chinmi kan um rih hi cu ngaihchia tuk asi. Politics cu a phung asi ko, kan ruahnak cu ai dan phung asi ko timi ruahnak zong hi kan Miphun ttanhnak lungput (Nationalism) in kan lonh/lanhtak a hau cang.
Note: Ka chungkhat ah NLD EC hmanh an um, CNLD ah ka chungkhat sahlawh zong an um lo nain Miphun pakhat ka sinak lungput in ka ttialmi asi.
A reltu nan dihlak cungah Miphun dawtnak lungthin Pathian nih in neihter hram ko hna seh. Ka lawm.

... 
Division-ah 1128, 2nd Division-ah 388 leh 3rd Division-ah 14 an pass a ni.

...
 25% a ni a, 1st Division leh 2nd Division-ah mi pakhat ve ve an pass a. Private Candidate mi pakhat awm bawkin 2nd Division-ah a pass a ni.

tikah pitlinnak cu hmuh asi theu. Milai “duhnak” hi a cak ngaingai, milai

Na Sunparnak A Si Ahcun
(Hlabia)
Key: E
[Caang 1]
Ka chim hlan in ka herhmi thil, Bawipa na hngalh dih ca le
Kan hal hlan in ka duhmi thi,l na hngalh dih ko caah
Ka chanbaunak ratpi lo in, thangthatnak kan pek Bawipa
Na sunparnak a si ah cun, na duhnak ka cung tlung seh..
[Nolh-Thannak]
Caan tampi Na khuakhannak hi theihthiam har ko hmanhseh
Caan tampi ka tonmi thil hi tuar awk har hmanh seh..
[Nolhnak]
Ka mitthli tlaknak hna le lungkuainak nih na sin an ka phanh ter
A dermi ka thazaang nih na hmai an kan kun ter
Ka ta an si cang tiah ka ruahmi hna lak than an si zongah
Na sunparnak a si ah cun
Bawipa na duhnak ka cung ah tlung seh..
[Caang 2]
Ka tuah hlan in ka ruahmi thil, Bawipa na hngalhdih cah le
Ka thawh hlan in ka kal nak ding, na hngalh dih ko caah
Phuhrunnak zei hmanh um lo in, ka sining dihlak kan pek
Na sunparnak a si ah cun na duhnak ka cung tlung seh..
[Saannak]
Lei harnak chung in ka nun luat ter ding kan hal lo
Vawlei chawva in ka nun lawmhter ding kan hal lo
Siseh tuarzia thiamnak thinlung ruahnak run ka pe
Mitha lo hna kutchung in luatter ding kan hal lo
Do tu hna cungah leh rul cham ding in kan hal lo
In khawhnak thazaang le ngaihthiamnak thinlung ka pe..

Mizoram le Manipur ah a ummi kan unau hna cu Israel cithlah kan si, Judah miphun tlau kan si tiin Israel ram ah fawi tein an pem hna. Israel ram cozah nih sunglawi tein a don hna.
Rammi sinak zong an pek colh hna lai zumh a um. An ram an phak in thla 5 hnu ahhin Pa cu ralkap lei ah an tla deuh i Nu cu social work deuh hi an tuan tiah an chim.
Mizoram in zeitindah Israel phun tlau kan si i kan miphun le kan ram taktak ah kir kan duh timi hi an sok ning a si hnga?An kal lai ahhin Aizawl ah special in training zong an pek hna ti a si.
Mizoram mipi hna nihcun Israel ram ah va pen khawh cu an lawmh pi ngai hna. A mah belte Mizoram minung kan tlawm chin sual lai ti bel an phang. Cheu khat comment ahcun tangka duh ruang ah a si ko cuh an ti ve.
Mahhi Judah phun tlau kan si timi pawl hi Mizoram an um lio ah kanmah bantuk Khrihfa an si maw? Si lo ah zeibantuk Khrihfa dah an si? Si lo ah muslim dah an si? An va phak hnu ah dah zeibantuk Biaknak dah an si? timi kha a theihngal mi nih van kan chim kho ulaw a tha.A that ko ahcun Chinmi zong cu Israel ah va pem khawhnak lam a um ve ko lai cu.Credit-Andrew Tum Tling

City Hunter| 2018 January 25| Avoi 70nak Chin Miphun Ni, Hakha, Vuan Tu Maung certual ah tuah dingmi paih zuamnak ah laksawng phun 7 pek ding paih committee phu nih an timh. Cu lakah zuamcawh paih champion laksawng cu champion taisawm le ks. 500,000 pek a si lai tiah kan theih.
Hi kong he pehtlai in Paih Committee haotu Pu Chum Ling nih The Chinland Post ah atu bantuk in a chim.
“Tutum paih zuamnak caah laksawng phun 7 pek kan timh. 1). Zatlang paih bualcotu laksawng hi ks. 300,000 le taisawm, 2
... 
ksawng hi ks. 300,000, 3). A phuphu paih pahnihnak laksawng hi ks. 150,000, 4). Paih aa dawh bik laksawng hi ks. 100,000, 5). A tam bik a teng khotu laksawng hi ks. 100,000, 6). Zuamcawh (singkhaw) paih champion laksawng hi champion taisawm le ks. 500,000 le 7). Zuamcawh paih pahnihnak laksawng hi ks. 300,000 pek an si lai.”
“Tukum paih tawlreltu phu nih chawva a zapi hman an timhmi hi ks. sing 30 (3,000,000) a si. Hi chung ah cozah lei nih zeitluk dik an kan chuahpiak khawh te hnga. Aa paimi th

Myanmar ram thlanglam Karen ramkulh, Mon ramkulh, Taninthari ramțhen sungah July 25 ihsin ruahsur tilian ruangah minung 3000 hrawng cu hmunhimnak hawlin an vakvai tiah humhimnak lam pawlkom pawlin an sim.
Mon ramkulh sungah Mawlamyine, Yi, Caihmazaw le Chaungsone peng pawl ihsin a siih, Karen ramkulh sungah Hlaingbwe peng le Taninthari ramțhen sungah Lawnglung peng ihsin an si.
Ruahsur tilian harsatnak ruangah mithi le mihlo an um hrih lo na’n, minung 3000 hrawng cu hmunhimnak hawlin an vakvai tiah humhimnak lam pawlkom in an sim.
Karen ramkulh Hlaingbwe peng ahhin July 25 ihsin ruahpi a sur thok ih July 26 zinglam ahcun Dawnah tlangtluan ih tikua pawl a lian ruangah Hlaingbwe khawpi veng tampi ah a lut ih tilian a tlung tiah khuami pawlin an sim.
Mon ramkulh Mawlamyine, Yi, Caihmazaw le Chaungsone khawpi pawl khal July 25 ihsin Thanlwin tipi a liam ih, motor zin le veng tinkim cu tidai in a khuh.

Covid 19 vangin India ram chuan kaithar leh thihpui a ngah tawh hle a. Hripui thawh hnihna an tih mai ‘second wave’ hian state tam tak a tibuai a, hmun tam takah curfew puan a niin lockdown hial sawi rik a ni leh ta.
India ram state zingah Maharastra, Punjab, West Bengal, Delhi-ah te chuan tun hnai chhoah Covid vei thar hi an hmu tam hle a, nikum he hripui a hluar hnua ni khat thil thua hmuh tam ber ni te a thleng leh tawh.
Hei hian Mizoram pawh a nghawng lo thei lo a, Mizorama hripui vei tlem t
... 
.
Mizorama natna hmuhchhuah Integrated Disease Surveillance Project lama hotu Dr. Pachuau Lalmalsawma chuan Mizorama hrivei an pun chhoh chhan chu state dang atanga Mizoram lo lut te ah Covid-19 hmuhchhuah a tam vang niin a sawi a. "India ram laili zawkah a hluar chuan Mizoramah pawh hri hi a hluar ve lo thei lo a ni,” a ti a. “India ramah hripui thawh hnihna hi a intan niin a lang a, India dinhmun a zir leh awmdan ang zelin Mizoram pawh hi kan awm niin a lang,” a ti bawk.
Mizoram sawrkarin inka
...
izoram an luh phal a ni a, darkar 96 a ral hnuah erawh test leh a ngai thung. Sawrkar inkaihhruaina siam ang chuan Mizorama lut tur reng reng chu ramri ah RAgT hmangin Covid-19 an vei leh vei loh enfiah zel tur a ni.
Mizoram ah January thla khan Covid-19 positive 156, February-ah 51, March-ah 53 bakah April 1, 2021 khan Covid-19 positive mi 8 hmuhchhuah an ni. March thla chawhma lam khan positive hmuhchhuah hi an tlem a; mahse, chawhnu lam atang khan a vei hmuhchhuah hi an pung chho leh ta a ni.

Kum 2018 a OD vanga a thih ṭep hnu ah a vawikhatna atan Demi Lovato chu Stage ah a inlan leh dawn.
Hma lawka Music Industry a chawimawina sang ber an sawi semchhuah tur Grammy Awards 2020 ah Perform in Stage ah hun a hmang dawn a ni.
Demi Lovato hian a Social Media kaltlangin Grammy 2020 a a Perform tur thu hi a sawi a, “I told you the next time you’d hear from me I’d be singing,” tia Caption in Grammy chu a Hashtag bawk.
Hriat ṭheuh angin 2018 July 24 khan a chenna ah Demi Lovato hi nikhawhrelo in an hmu a, OD vangin a thi hman teuh hle. A damdawi hi Prince nunna a chan phahna kha an ti. Hemi hnu aṭang hian Lovato hi a inkhung hrang deuh chawt a, Event lian tham ah pawh a tel tawh lo.
A dinhmun tawn mek erawh a in pawm thiam ang reng hle. Selna a dawn te chu insiam ṭhatna atan a hmang zui zawk. Pathian in a nunna a zuah sak vangin lawmthu a sawi a, a phak leh theih ang tawkin Pathian lam ah a inhmang zui ta nghal. Dating thleng in a inthunun a. People Magazine hnen ah a duhthlanna siam chu thil ṭha leh dik a ni tih a hrilh bawk.
Grammy Awards 2020 hi Jan.26 ah Los Angeles ah semchhuah tur a ni.

Chin state, Tonzang peng ah nu a tlaihhrem tiin lunghrinhmi kum 23 pa cu ni 5 hnu ah a nulepa nih palek sakhan ah an ap.
Thil sining: Tonzang peng Tuitum khuami Hau Siang Piang, kum 23 cu August 2 ah Kalaymyo in mawttaw aa cit i zaan 8pm ah Tonzang khuapi luhnak Khawlai sang ah a ttum.
Pawngkam um inn pakhat ah a kal i ‘khua chung um hotel ah ka thlah ta uh’ tiah bawmh a hal hna. Inn ngeitu nu nih kum 21 nu cu ‘na saikal in va thlah ta’ tiah bawmh a halpiak chin caah a thlah.
Zuu dawr hmai an phak in an i dinta. Hau Sian Piang nih zuu aa cawk i ‘kan khua pawng tiang ka thlah’ ati. Amah nih saikal cu a mongh i an khua pawng datsi dawr ah saikal cu a dirter. Kum 21 nu cu tlu lakin a nam i a tlaihhrem.
Hau Sian Piang cu a zaam caah an tlai kho colh lo.
Cucaah a nulepa nih August 7 ah Tonzang palek sakhan ah an hung ap.
Hau Sian Piang cu Tonzang palek sakhan nih Sualman Upadi Dal 376/511 in case an on piak.
Tonzang palek sakhan bawi nih, “tlaihhrem case taktak a phan lo. Thazaang chuah tiang lawng asi. Mipa nih inn ah ka thlah a ti i lam tanttim ah tlaihhrem dingin thazaang a chuah lio ah minu a au i pawngkam mi nih an rak but dih caah a tlaihhrem manh lo,” tiah a chim.
Nain, Tonzang Zatlang Zohkhenhnak Zung Riantuan pakhat nih, “a ningzah caah khatin a chimmi si lai. Minu cu sibawi nih an chek tikah a chiattha a tleek an ti,” tiah a chim.
July 22 zongah Tonzang peng Natzang khuate ah Tang 3 a kai liomi kum 9 ngakchia nute cu lam rianttuan kum 27 pa nih a rak tlaihhrem. — Zalen

Shan ram then le Karenni ram then, ram ri um, Mobey Peng ah SAC ralhrang an mah le an mah hriamnam ngan mi hman in an i kap ruang ah a thi mi an um kho men tiah Mobey PDF lei nih an chim.
Loikaw miak pi ralkap len in, an kah mi 120MM pa hnih cu, Mobey Peng Set Taw Ya tlang ralhrang riahbuk ah a tla, ralhrang lei a thi mi an um kho men tiah theih a si.
Mipi lei i fonh phu MBPDF 1001, MBPDF 1007, Phekhon PDF B-01, Loikaw PDF, DMO1101, Naypyitaw PDF, KNDF, KA, KGZ le URA hna nih SAC ralhrang cu an kah cuahmah hna.
Kah doh nak a chuah ruang ah, Mobey lei khual tlawn lo ding tiah thawng an thanh.

...

Aizawl, the 28th December 2023 : Sports & Youth Services Minister Pu Lalnghinglova Hmar chu vawiin khan Maj. Gen. Gagan Deep, Additional Director General NCC North Eastern Region leh NCC hotute dangten a pisa ah hmuin, Mizo thalaite tan NCC kaltlanga huap zau zawka hmalak dan an sawiho.
Sports Minister Pu Lalnghinglova Hmar chuan NCC chu thalaite tan thil tha tak mai, mahni inrintawka, mahni inthununna leh nun kaihhruaina tha inzirtirna a ni tiin NCC chu Mizo thalai ten an tangkaipui hle thin nia a hmuh thu NCC hotupa hi a hrilh a. Ruihtheih thil laka thalaite an fihlim theih nan leh nun kawng dik an zawh theih nan NCC chu thalaite tan hmanraw tha leh pawimawh tak nia a hriat thu Minister chuan a sawi a. NCC kaltlanga Mizo thalaite sipai officer ah an lut thin chu lawmawm a tih thu sawiin, hei aia tam zawk an luh thei dan kawng dappui turin NCC hotupa hi a ngen bawk a ni.
